Title: Asked for Refund, Got a Runaround
Content: Purchased for my older father who is not great with tech. Reached out to customer service numerous times that the ring is not working properly and we'd like to return it. Kept getting a run around to have my father submit logs. I made it clear we weren't interested in beta testing or problem solving, we were asking for a refund. Never given.

Title: Very happy with purchase
Content: Very happy with purchase. Ring is comfortable, accurate. No subscription needed

Title: Do not order from ringconn
Content: Do not order anything from this company! Ships out of china took over a month to receive item. Customer service doesn’t email you anything when they verbally tell you they will. Purchase from any other smart ring company but them.

Title: Day 1 user of the Gen 1 Ring.
Content:
Day 1 user of the Gen 1 Ring.
Overall very satisfied with the product, the price and the possibility of not needing any supscription.
After nearly 2 years, the battery of my Gen1 Ring had a slight problem, which could be resolved very fast after contacting customer support. Will recommend this firm when friends are in need of a smart ring!

Title: Overall great
Content: Works well, wears very comfortabel, does not scratch, many parameters in the app, responsive service desk, active further development, overall great.

Title: I am quite pleased with my RingConn Gen 3
Content:
I ordered my RingConn 2 during the Kickstarter campaign. I am a patient person and found no problems with that process, they kept me informed and delivered when promised.

I have been enjoying my ring very much, I’m not concerned with super accuracy, but use it to measure my sleep, stress, activity trends. When I reached out to them about a problem, they responded promptly and the ring was ultimately replaced.

There is always room for improvement but I recommend the ring and the company.

Title: General use
Content: This ring is awesome compared to one of your competitors. I like the fact that you get more than 4 days of charging and when you do need a charge a friendly reminder notifies you to do so with plenty of time still on a charge. No subscription is need too. Only drawback would be the limited amount of sports you can choose from under the Exercise tab. If they would add tennis or pickleball to the list that would be helpful,

Title: All is well done.
Content:
All is well done.
Funny enough I like the plastic which ist ment to be put around the ring as protection. I use the plastic ring in front of the ring as protection against loosing the ring (I have lost already 2 rings (-:.
What I do not yet know is: how do I bring the data into the app if I want to tell, that I have done 90 minutes strenth training or 30 minutes orgometer (cardio-) training.

Title: Unable to sign in to account
Content: Unable to sign in to account. Called and no one contacted me

Title: Great product and great customer service
Content: Date of experience: March 01, 2025

Title: Sleep Apnea recognition works very well
Content: Sleep apnea recognition works very well. I hope that future software updates will recognize even more sporting activities (such as swimming, horse riding, etc.)

Title: Gives great ongoing info about my…
Content: Gives great ongoing info about my health to share with my doctor and myslf.

Title: Gen 2 is great, Service is best!
Content: Gen 2 is great! Ecact Steps, Heart Rate, Sleep Apnoe fits with medical Check and Looks genius - App also very good. Im glad but the best is the customer Service - got a free replacement from size 14 to size 13 even after few weeks of usage! Thats what i call Service!👍👍👍

Title: What RingConn does it does very well…
Content: What RingConn does it does very well but it is significantly lacking in activity options. Right now it only offers 4 very basic activities. Hopefully this can be fixed with software updates in the near future.

Title: Sleep monitor - check!
Content:
I bought ringconn specifically for sleep patterns. This ring has exceeded my expectations. I've been wearing it non-stop for almost 2 months. It's so thin and easy I forget it's on my finger. Definitely opt to get the sizing kit as it fits differently.
ns FINALLY my big love is battery life. I get at least 10 days but often more than advertised...I get 14-16 days on a single charge. That blasts all other smart rings away.
And all this data keeps syncing without a monthly fee! That was a showstopper for me. Get this smart ring. It's awesome!

Title: This ring is great
Content: This ring is great. Has so much information.

Title: Buying and using the RingConn2
Content:
Key points: Pros- great service, smooth buying experience and love the product. Sleep tracking is excellent. (For women- cycle tracking aspect is intuitive and un-intrusive)
Cons- only registers running and cycling as exercises, no manual entry for other forms of exercise or times when you can't wear it.

I backed the RingConn2 in its Kickstarter campaign. The whole process was smooth and hassle free. I got my sizing kit fairly quickly, and wore a few different sizes to see what felt right. I found it very difficult to select the right size, but eventually settled on one. When the time came, I selected my colour and size, and sat back and waited for my order to be shipped. Once I got it, I discovered that the fit was not as I expected, but enough larger than the demo sizer to not fit me properly, so I requested a size exchange. This went through without a hitch, and I absolutely LOVE my RingConn2 ring! It tracks my sleep very well (which is the main reason I got it) and all my other bios. The one and only nit that I would pick would be that you can't enter manual exercise entries, and the ring only records running & cycling. This means that the fitness classes that I do where I can't wear the ring don't get recognised as active/activity times. Also, it doesn't register any of the fitness classes I do as exercise, and if it's a low/no impact class that doesn't register any steps but does raise the heartrate, the app registers my exercise as moderate stress.
This is not enough of an issue to impact my satisfaction with the ring and the process of buying it online.
The cycle tracking is fairly basic but pretty easy to use and easy enough to modify if needed. The interface is intuitive and un-intrusive.

Title: Great product
Content: Great product

Title: I love the RingConn but
Content: I love the RingConn. This is my second one. The first one just stopped working one day. I submitted a support ticket & they replaced it. That was fantastic. Unfortunately the second one after about a year of use the battery went from lasting 6 or 7 days to nos barely surviving 24 hours. It happened overnight. I have fully charged it several times & run it dead but treated no improvement in the battery life.

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

Title: Really enjoy the tool to track my day
Content: So far my gen2 ring has been a great product. Unfortunately my last ring failed after 30 days, I believe it may of been one of the updates. But I don’t know for sure. The support team worked with me and got me a replacement, it did take a while but it was a new release ring at the time. It tracked everything very accurately. I have compared the 02 readings to my pulsox finger reader and the 02 and puls are always within 1-2 points. The ring is light and there are plenty of cover options. The sleep monitor is pretty accurate. Might be off by 15-30 min for sleep time sometimes. I am excited for them to add more exercise to track. Great app, easy to get my information.

Title: Really impressed
Content:
Really impressed. RingConn is serious in improving and the measurements are more and more accurate. What I get now for steps, hearth rate, stress, sleep is pretty similar to my smartwatch.

Good quality though after few months the black paint is slowly fading on the bottom which gets frequent bumps.

Very happy with purchase even though I consider smart rings to be way too expensive.

I bought to get better insight on my sleep because watch is too bulky for sleep.

Title: I have the Gen 2 ring
Content:
I have the Gen 2 ring. So far, it was ok to set up. The app is excellent and the sleep apnea diagnostics are equal to or better than in home sleep studies.

There is one annoying software feature which I hope they correct......they sleep apnea diagnostics runs for 3 consecutive nights then it automatically turns off. I have lost two nights of data due to this quirk.

Title: Great Product & Outstanding Customer Service!
Content:
I discovered the RingConn 2 through Kickstarter and purchased it as a Super Early Bird. Right from the start, the ring met my expectations, and with each update, the app improved even further.

Unfortunately, over New Year’s, I experienced a significant decline in battery performance. Since battery wear and tear is excluded from the warranty, I reached out to customer service. Their support was excellent – they provided multiple solutions, and I even kept a log to help diagnose the issue.

What can I say? My ring was replaced without any hassle! The customer service was always courteous and helpful. I can wholeheartedly recommend both the product and the support team.

Title: Returned the ring and it was delivered…
Content: Returned the ring and it was delivered about 3 weeks ago, still haven't received a refund and I keep getting the run around from the company.

Title: Love love my v.2 Ring conn
Content: Love love my v.2 Ring conn. From the get go seeing all the impressive data is incredibly addictive and informative Upgraded because I really liked v.1 but the allure of a slimmer profile, longer battery life and apnea tracking all with out a subscriber fee. Sign me up! Was very disappointed to find that after a couple months the battery life was significantly declining to the point it needed charging each day. I mentioned to customer support and after trying a few things to troubleshoot they quickly offered a replacement ring. Arrived quickly and with not drama I also love that they listen to their customers as well when a new update included a dark background (resulting in even longer battery life) I was very upset as it made it very difficult for me to read. Many others felt the same. They now offer the option of both settings. So. Love their responsiveness. And great product! Highly recommend

Title: Happy with purchase and customer…
Content: Happy with purchase and customer service.

Title: Bad Customer Service & Questionable Performance…
Content:
They flat out refused to answer some of my initial questions I wanted answered so I could decide if I wanted to buy the ring 2. I asked most of the questions multiple time, rewording them each time in case a language barrier was at fault, but they never addressed my questions accurately.

I need to test more accurately, but the ring results do not seem to be that accurate most of the time, like not counting the steps correctly, and sleep time, Etc...

Title: The ring is comfortable!
Content: The ring is comfortable to wear. I'm able to share the status of my ring with my daughter after setting up the sharing settings. I now know how little sleep I was getting and working on it. i can shower with it and it has a great battery that last long time unlike the Apple I watch.

Content: I am pleased with the performance of the product. A lot of reviews downgrade the app. The app has been stable, easy to connect, and provides all the information I am looking for. My only note is the exercise monitoring needs some work. Strongly suggest you get the sizing test kit and wear it for 24 h as instructed. I sized up 1 as a result. Shipping was slower than expected on the ring. Overall well satisfied

Title: Love it
Content:
Je suis emballé
🥰🥰🥰

Content:
I like the long battery life, heart rate information and other features.

I would like the app to offer or recognize more exercise activity options.

What's the difference between an abnormality and an apnea event? The only thing that would make the ring more perfect is if it could monitor for AFIB and blood pressure.

I wish it had an exercise to track indoor walks. If I’m walking indoors I just use the running indoors but I’m surprised it’s not an option. I am looking forward to seeing the accuracy of outdoor cycling rides once the weather gets better that’s one of the main reasons I got the ring. My smart watch was just too bulky and wasn’t fitting in with my day to day style. I also enjoy the sleep tracking

Content: I used an Oura Ring during two years. When I wanted to move from the Oura Ring 3 to 4, nothing was done to facilitate the transfer of my subscription. So, I looked for another connected ring. I chose RingCom. I don't regret it. The ring is cheaper, thinner, there is no subscription, there is a community and the data is very easy to understand. In addition, as I travel a lot, the charge case is a better solution. So, congratulation to RingCom team.

Title: Tracking my sleep and health really…
Content: Tracking my sleep and health really well, better than a fitness watch.

The ring is a good idea to substitute strap sensors or even iWatches but it only works well in low heartbeat frequencies. From 150bpm onwards it doesn’t detect anything more.
I wouldn’t recommend it for ambitious sport activities

Title: Love my Ringcomm
Content: Love my Ringcomm. Obtain very useful information and help any issues that may arise. HIGHLY recommend.

Title: Simple, Efficient, Long Lasting Smart Ring in the Market!
Content: Why RingConn? I've tried other smart fit tracker device and smart watches are not for me. I'm personally looking for a smart ring device that is simple, efficient and has long lasting battery. Comparing it with other brands in the market, their technology and "free app" integration were the wins for me. Not to mention, its affordable price range. I wanted to use it mainly to keeping track of my heart rates and primarily my sleep. I got the RingConn 2 Silver from their Black Friday sale on their website as an early Christmas gift for myself! It was definitely worth the purchase! Shipping was fast to the Philippines. Make sure first to get their sizing kit to ensure you'll get the perfect and comfortable fit. I've been using it for the past three months and it's pretty much seamless- sometimes I forgot that I'm wearing it. One downside though is the silicone ring protection. It's thin enough for comfort however not that durable as it got essily worn out. Nonetheless, this dmart ring device serves its purpose to let me know how I'm sleeping and a motivation to drive a fit lifestyle. Thank you RingConn Team! More power and I hope the app stays free 🙏

Content: Ring sizer shipped quickly, but once I submitted my size, it took over 3 weeks to ship out the actual ring, despite the website saying that shipping turnaround time was 3 days. I like the ring otherwise and am very happy with the actual performance.

Title: This is my second one (Gen2) love it…
Content: This is my second one (Gen2) love it feels & works great

Content: The ring delivery and shipping process was a little delayed. The ring itself is okay not the best perks looking at it I mainly use mine to track my sleep and stress but other than that it’s not that useful. It barely has exercise options so I can’t even use that. It doesn’t quite accurately track steps and physical health things like it mentioned.

Title: This ring gives you a wealth of information about you!
Content:
I've really been impressed with this ring, it's been helpful in confirming my sleep apnea and helping me make changes so that I can be healthier. I would like to see more information in the future, like circadian rhythm monitors,

But most of all, I'd like to see tracking for people with chronic illness. We have different needs than always healthy people, but we are also in need of health tracking like this. Something that adjusts to our needs would be really awesome. I can see the hints of such things already in the app, I hope to see more in the future.

Title: Customer service really helpful
Content: Customer service really helpful

Title: Best SmartRing
Content: I’ve had this ring for two or three months now, and I’ve been wearing it almost every day, and I love it! I found the sizing to be pretty accurate to the kit that they offer. With the gold finish, beware that the palm side of the ring will scratch if you’re using it to work out with dumbbells, etc. However, this is expected and the most visible parts of the ring hold up very well to every day wear and tear. I love the app and how easily accessible everything is, and the battery life of the ring is exceptional! It really does last around 10 days on a full charge. I bought this ring because I didn’t like the sporty look of most smart watches, as I typically have to wear business professional clothing. Both me and my friend whom I recommended the ring to love this wearable technology! And let’s not forget that you don’t have to pay to use the RingConn app😉

Title: This is my second RingConn Ring
Content: This is my second RingConn Ring. The first lasted 2 years until the battery wore out. I like this one because it offers more variables to measure. I hope the battery lasts longer.

Title: Everything is well executed
Content: Everything is well executed. The user graphic for sleep stages could be a bit more clear. The sleep apnea metric will need ongoing work and research if it can ever get FDA approval. And the battery life and recharging time are phenomenal. I look at it and am reminded of areas I would benefit from taking action on.

Content: Great timely feedback. The ring works quietly in the background gathering a variety of health data. Ringconn is very responsive and I appreciate the firmware regular updates.

Ring works very well, easy interface to android.
I wear it 24/7.
Got my wife a Gen 2 for Christmas.

I placed the order for the sizing kit in mid-November, and the ring came in early January after telling the seller my size. I have been wearing it for approximately two months now. Battery drains visibly faster than the first month, and two nights of sleeping data have been missed. It's still working. However, I am worried about how long it will last.

Title: So apart from the long shipping time…
Content:
So apart from the long shipping time due to it coming from china, the ringconn has been amazing. For starters this ring has an amazing battery life. At no point has it ever run low. I bought this to track my sleep so I can charge my watch and still get accurate sleep data. Overall it has very similar data as my apple watch 10 collects but with the added bonus of a 2 week battery life.

As for the sleep apnea tracking I have used it once or twice and it seems to be pretty accurate, again in line with my watch data.

Title: I absolutely love my Ring.
Content: I absolutely love my Ring. I had gen 1 and lost it. I upgraded it to gen 2 and am so glad I did. It’s amazing. I love all of its functions! It’s worth the extra money.

Title: I like the product but it took over a…
Content: I like the product but it took over a month to arrive with little to no explanation

Title: Manage Health
Content: Date of experience: February 27, 2025

Title: The ring is beautiful and tracks…
Content: The ring is beautiful and tracks everything I need. So much better than a bulky watch.

Title: Product build quality is great
Content:
Product build quality is great, works extremely well, and customer service was fantastic.

I needed a change of size as my received ring was just slightly too large, and customer service let me post it back for a downsize. Throughout the entire process, the team was highly responsive.

Title: Battery Issue
Content: Had a bad battery issue, a 100% charge lasted barely over a day. I documented it and referred it to Feedback a few times. They determined it was a hardware issue and sent me a replacement. No fuss, no muss.

Title: Very happy with sleep tracking and…
Content: Very happy with sleep tracking and battery life. Activity tracking needs improvement. It is not accurate and needs to support additional activities. Heart Rate is not accurate when running. I am a skier and the activity tracking struggles with measuring effort, very inconsistent. Would be great if it can track alpine runs and vertical but the ring may not have the hardware needed for that and I prefer the smaller size.

Title: The product is ok
Content: The product is good. The application is good with a lot of data. I don’t like that there are only 3 options to choose to track exercise. I do multiple forms of exercise and can only track running and biking. That’s stupid. I wrote RingConn and they sent an absurd reply regarding an “algorithm” that makes it difficult to track. I especially do not like the fact that the terms and conditions/privacy agreement basically states that all data obtained from the device is property of the People’s Republic of China (PRC). This feels like a violation of my privacy to know my health data is now the property of another government.

Title: Arrived as expected
Content: Arrived as expected. Quick delivery with the size kit and the ring.

Title: Excellent quality
Content: Excellent quality. Arrived early

Title: I love my Ring!!
Content: I love my Ring!!! I can’t believe I waited this long to purchase one! It’s amazing how much it can do. I love this thing! And costumer service is so nice. I just had a couple questions before I received my Ring and they got back to be so quick!

Title: Problem quickly resolved.
Content: I ordered the ring through Kickstarter. It was quite a wait but eventually the ring arrived. I think Ring Conn did it's best after all it is a new product. After a few months the ring had an issue with the battery. I needed to charge it every 8 hours. Contacted Ring Conn service and they were just fantastic. They sent me a new one immediately. I now hope this one will work as long as possible. Anyway good job Ring Conn!

Title: Responsive Team & Easy Replacement Experience
Content: I had a great experience with RingConn's customer support. The team was very responsive and guided me through the ring exchange process smoothly. They allowed me to keep my old ring until the new one arrived, which made the transition seamless. The communication was clear, and the support team was always helpful. Overall, I highly appreciate their excellent service and would definitely recommend RingConn to others!

Content: Nice tracking and info along the way (both test kit and the ring). Product is faultless. I think the app could be a bit better (like a summary at the top of just stats) and a web page would be a nice touch.

Title: The ring has exceeded my expectation
Content: The ring has exceeded my expectation! Very impressed with the data and the fact it is NOT a subscription.

Title: I don't understand why the ring stops…
Content: I don't understand why the ring stops working when it gets to 20%. It goes into search mode. I have tried everything and nothing works 😞

Title: Horrible customer service
Content: Horrible customer service when my ring wouldn’t work. It took over a month for them to begin to care. I never received a replacement nor a refund for my ring that lasted less than a month.

Title: Great product! Shipping process could be refined.
Content: Product and value are great. The purchase experience was well thought out and overall nicely presented. Great care taken with the sizing kit. Only real downside is the shipping times. Especially when you take into account it takes twice as long when you do the sizing kit. Understandable considering things are shipping from China, but increasing your distribution presence in North America would really go a long way for the purchase process.

Title: I haven’t received this item nor have I…
Content: I haven’t received this item nor have I received any updates. It’s like it was never ordered, however my credit was definitely charged.

Title: Always
Content: Always, constantly disconnecting from phone

Title: Ring conn is a joy to wear with amazing…
Content: Ring conn is a joy to wear with amazing data sets. I just wish RingConn had a referral program. I’d sell a lot of them.

Title: Great Ring, Great Service
Content: I found this product via Kickstarter and have been pleased throughout the entire journey. The ring itself is comfortable, affordable (but not in any way cheap), and carries great functionality. Mine seemed to stop working after about ~6 months, but customer service was immediate to respond and sent me a new ring within a week. Great experience overall. Would recommend.

Title: Not happy with the measurements so far…
Content: Not happy with the measurements so far , some time they are just not accurate

Title: Works great, needs better instructions.
Content: The ring is attractive and does everything I expected. I only wish there was a more in depth, comprehensive guide showing you all the things that it can do. Even after 3 months with the app I'm still discovering new things I can do with it, so something up front to help familiarize us with everything it is capable of would be appreciated.

Title: Great fitness tracking device
Content: Great fitness tracking device! Easy to use and fun to look at all the metrics. Helpful in detection of sleep abnormalities, which is primarily why I bought this.

Title: Great Ring Overall
Content: I got the ring initially to wear at night for sleep tracking, in place of my Garmin watch. The ring's accuracy is equal to or better than my watch. The battery life last for a week, which is great and lets me charge it during lunch once a week.

Title: Very good quality and amazing clearness…
Content: Very good quality and amazing clearness about bodyfunctions, sleep and Apnoe. Only missing sports opportunities… only walking isn‘t enough… Fitness, riding etc. would be nice.

Title: fantastic ring
Content: fantastic ring. easy to wear, long battery, pretty, efficient. Tells me everything I need to know and no subscription.

Title: strong and reliable battery life.
Content:
strong and reliable battery life.
Sleep hours' parameter accuracy is close to real-time, which is amazing for triggering a health-conscious mindset.

Title: Very informative
Content: Very informative, helpful and platform friendly

Title: Excellent product
Content: Excellent product, accurate readings and helpful information/feedback to improve your overall health! I highly recommend this product

Title: When I exercise
Content:
When I exercise, it count as stress! When I excersice, it doesn't usually count as activity. There is no options for Yoga, meditatition etc.

The ring doesn't automatically sync with the APP, it should be and send me notifications in the APP in case of sedentary and other parameters.

It should also suggest how to improve my goals etc. Though it does more suggestion is appreciated.

The battery life and the pouch is one of it's kind and is the best thing with the ring.

Title: I love RingConn
Content: I love RingConn. The app is easy to use, it tracks so much information.

Title: Good product
Content: Date of experience: January 31, 2025

Title: Prompt service
Content: Customer service has been efficient and prompt. Happy so far with my selection of this product

Title: Great fit, super comfortable smart ring with the best battery by a wide margin.
Content: The ring feels and looks great. Extremely comfortable to wear all day/night. Battery life is impressive and as good as it claims, unlike other competitors. But app needs work. UiX is a bit clunky and not intuitive. Stress measurement is not accurate at all.

Title: There’s room for improvement.
Content:
I like the ring sizing kit. It was more than what expected. I wear the actual ring every day. It is solid and comfortable. Also waterproof. I don’t have to take it off to shower. The only improvement that it needs is better accuracy of the oxygen monitoring. I wear a pulse oximeter (Wellue) that is very accurate. The ring, in comparison, reads 3-5 points higher consistently. If that could be improved, I would trust it more to wear alone and not have to use the extra device.
Hopefully the battery will hold its 7 day charge for a long time, which is another great feature.

Title: Lacks major connected app support. MFP, google health, etc...
Content:
This ring does no tnconnect well to 3rd pty apps

There is no google health support, which replaced fit, and is literally 1/2 of the market share for android phones in the US, probably the world.

Step syncing to fit is not 1:1 counts are horribly off, and remain that way, its not a syncing lag, its literally the wrong data.

The ring itself is awesome with a great app and amazing insights, but most of us are going to use My fitness pal, or some other health app, and neither are compatible with this device either

There are some easy wins here if Rongconn fixes this, but if your expecting this ring to fit your ecosystem you will be disappointed in the lack of connected app support.

Title: Is not very accurate so it’s not that…
Content: Is not very accurate so it’s not that helpful.

Title: Love this ring
Content: Love this ring! Tracks my sleep apnea and all the info I need is there.

Title: Allow activities to be rearranged
Content: It would be nice if the order of the activities could be rearranged. I do an outdoor walk but it’s last on the list to select.

Title: great battery life
Content: great battery life, very simple to use app and no subscription costs

Title: I love my RingConn
Content: I love my RingConn. Shipping and delivery were very fast. Set up was quick. The user experience within the app is nicely laid out and information is presented in a way that is easy to read.

Title: I'm in love!
Content: I like the look and feel on my finger; very accurate; amazing app; no subscription fee; long battery life. What's not to love?

Title: Good choice
Content: "I am very satisfied with the experience. The ring is as expected. I am glad I made this choice."

Title: Great product and company is always…
Content: Great product and company is always working to improve the product!

Title: i love the ring
Content: i love the ring, it keeps me acountable of my sleep patterns, and definetly is more accurate in counting my steps than your cellphone. I also love the fit , I hve the color gold which I love. I hve recommended this to one of my friends and she also loves it.

Title: RingConn is very comfortable to use
Content: RingConn is very comfortable to use, all features are very detailed and I can track better my life style.

Title: I love the ring so much
Content: I love the ring so much, it's helped me learn so much about myself. But shipping took a ridiculously long time and most of that time was your company holding my product.

Title: The amount of data the ring acquires is…
Content:
The amount of data the ring acquires is just overwhelming. Sleep tracking is interesting. Stress monitoring does not fit to my subjective feeling. Stress is said to be high when I was relaxed and vice versa.
The heart rate during indoor cycling is completely incorrect. During outdoor running it fits to my applewatch. Overall a great experience.

Title: Absolute Disappointment
Content:
Absolute Disappointment!
The period predictions are totally off let alone the ovulation window. This was a big reason for buying the ring and I have very disappointed on spending so much for something that cannot be used for the intended purposes. I have started recommending people spend a little more and get a product that can atleast help with accurate predictions. Other brand rings are letting people know they are getting sick/pregnant beforehand and this ring even with a 102 degree temperature showed by body temperature in range.What else can I say.

Title: Very satisfied
Content: I recently upgraded from a Gen1 to a Gen2, and the customer service team has been fantastic. They were incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and a pleasure to work with.

Title: Love it ❤️
Content: I have to say this was a great option for a smart ring. I have referred many people. Love that there’s no monthly fee.

Title: The RingConn Gen 2 (RCG2) is an…
Content: The RingConn Gen 2 (RCG2) is an excellent health ring that helps me meet my health goals. It tracks my steps, heart rate, and blood oxygen level. I shopped around, and chose RCG2 because it does what the others do, but also has sleep apnea detection. It is thin and light, and has longer battery life than the competition. It also has no subscription fee to use the app. A bonus is that the app shares data with Google Fit app, and I use both. My only complaint is once I confirmed the size, and changed my mind on color, the online order page never showed a change in choices or order status, then it took two weeks to arrive. However, customer service was quick to respond, and reassuring. It is beautiful, and comfortable. I'm very happy with it, and would recommend to others.

Content: The ring arrived promptly and was well packaged. I have been wearing the ring consistently since I received it. I love the sleep apnea part f the ring. The information that it gives is amazing.

Title: Their support
Content: The best I was amazed by their support

Title: Great Resource
Content: I received my ring about 6 weeks ago and really enjoy it. I love the step tracker, sleep tracker, and that it will track my stress and vital signs which is important to me. I enjoy that I can share data with friends…my husband and I have a competition for who gets more steps (and sleep!) I have noticed that it will label it “light sleep” when I’m laying down watching a movie. The only other thing I would love to be able to do is trigger it to track my vitals at specific moments. Otherwise, I say it was a great investment and appreciate that there isn’t a monthly fee.

Title: Great ring
Content:
I love the ease of connecting the ring to the Bluetooth and the app.
I love the sleep apnea & hypopnea assessments.
However,I miss the data, explanations and graphics of the Ouraring.
However because there is no maintenance fee, it makes sense.
Thank you.

Title: Great health monitor.
Content: The ring was slow to ship, but it has been worth the wait. I love the detailed information and functionality provided in the app all without a monthly subscription. The sleep apnea monitoring is a big part of why I waited to puchase a higher end health monitor. It appears accurate. The readings are even a little higher than what my CPAP machine reads. The only thing lacking is it's ability to pick up naps, but at least they can be manually added. Additional exercise options would be nice too. I don't actually use that feature because nothing matches what I usually do.

Title: Solid product
Content: Works as advertised, strong battery life, fit and finish is really good. Being able to use HSA money was a big positive.

Title: Comfy and informative
Content: Comfy and informative! The sizing ring option was great so I could make sure I got the best one, and overall it's super comfy to sleep in, and even with my smaller hands the ring doesn't look bulky or abnormal. I love seeing the information and stats and the battery life is great--if you charge it when you do things like shower, you don't have to worry about having it off any night or for long periods.

Title: I am so happy with my device
Content: I am so happy with my device! I switched from a smart watch and couldn't be happier.

Title: Unfit for Purpose
Content: There is no facility to enter fitness activities, despite showing a girl working out with weights in the promotional material. It is completely useless for me. Total waste of time.

Title: I have had a mostly positive experience…
Content:
I have had a mostly positive experience with my ring.
It seems to be inaccurate when I compare SPO2 levels ie vital signs vs sleep apnea monitoring.
It sometimes irritates my finger because of thickness/shape.
Overall, I really prefer Ringconn over watches and other SPO2 monitors.

Title: The ring fits great and lasts for close…
Content: The ring fits great and lasts for close to 2 weeks on 1 charge. No subscription needed to track my vitals. Not so sure how much I trust the sleep apnea but so far looking good. Wish it did more for workout tracking, but from what I'm reading that's a limitation on rings in general. So far I'm very happy with the purchase.

Title: Not quite what I expected
Content: I use a wrist step counter too. The wrist counter and the ring have significantly different step counts. In addition it takes awhile for it to update each day.

Title: This is a great product
Content: This is a great product, a game changer in my health, the sleep app is so much better than the Fitbit I was using before.

Title: Delivering process
Content: The problem I experienced is that choosing express delivery, it did not inform the estimated delivery date.

Title: it doesn't track weight, most health insurance apps don't connect
Content: Golly it tracks almost everything else except weight. Heart rate, sleep apnea. Stress, skin temp. Battery is awesome

Title: I love my RingConn
Content: I love my RingConn I was looking for a smart device mainly to monitor my sleep and stress levels and its been fantastic, the battery is very long-lasting having about a week of life before I need to charge, the data seems accurate and although there is room for improvements in some areas overall is an excellent product and without extra cost, unlike others in the market.

Title: Love the riing, once I got it
Content: Love the ring and app. I only wish they could have said how long it would take to get the ring once it was ordered. It was about 4 weeks, but all they would say is "We received your order and are working hard to get it to you, we'll let you know when it ships." So I didn't know if it would be days or months. If they could give a very rough time frame to set expectations, it would have been a better buying experience.

Title: No accurate readings for exercise…
Content: No accurate readings for exercise (submitted a complain) and heart rates. Also I have noisy snoring and difficult breathing in sleep which were not detected.

The App is good - I maybe wish it would show more workout options and maybe even skin temperature during the day and not only while sleeping. OVERALL I am very happy with the ring as of yet.

Title: works great and looks good
Content: Date of experience: February 20, 2025

Title: Fantastic company
Content: Fantastic company. The whole ordering process was completely smooth. The stated delivery times were adhered to. The ring is a super product. Very well made and all functions have been working for weeks without the slightest problem. I am delighted and have already bought 2 additional rings for the family in the meantime.

Title: I expected better
Content: The ring looks good and fits perfectly. The app is poorly translated to Finnish and SpO2 shows false when i tested also the rates with a real medical device. I expected better quality with this price.

Title: After the first month
Content: After the first month I can say the ring experience is great: easy to use, detailed and easily understandable. Great to have a sizing kit before purchasing the ring. Customer care quickly answer. The shipment is not the fastest (especially compared to famous brands), but quick enough

Title: Good
Content: Good data, and ring looks nice. Only downside is that battery life is more like 6-7 days instead of 11.

Title: The RingCon 2 is perfect to wear and…
Content: The RingCon 2 is perfect to wear and make a great job! I like the App, where you can see all important health topics!

Title: you don’t need anything else
Content: best product to buy.

Title: Network Connection Problem
Content:
Network Connection Problem

I like the features, but if it doesn’t work, it‘s terrible. After the last update i can‘t get an Network Connection.
Please fix that.

Title: It tells me all I need to know about my activities in the day
Content: It tells me all I need to know about my day

Title: RingConn has exceeded my expectations…
Content: RingConn has exceeded my expectations since the moment I placed my order. The ring itself is AMAZING - it has far more features than I thought it would have and it is incredibly useful for me. In addition, the price is great, the customer service is fast and helpful. I am recommending this product to all of my clients and friends!

Title: Sort of good
Content:
I bought the ring with the hope of replacing a monitoring band for sleep and stress tracking.
The experience has been ok...ish. It tracks your pulse and blood oxigen quite accurately. Also stress during the day is pretty accurate.
When it comes to sleep tracking, that's where things take a turn for the worse. While it is quite good in identifying when you go to sleep (it makes the difference between sleeping and just lying on the couch watching a movie), the actual sleep parameters, I find are quite off. You generally wake up to a sleep score of over 85 even on bad nights. HRV during the night, for me, was quite unchanged, whether I had a relaxation day or an intense workout day with lots of work besides it. It generally overshoots both REM and Deep Sleep, undershooting awake time.
Activity tracking is limited to walking, running and biking and only if location is turned on. This last part, for me, was enough reason to not use it as an activity tracker.
On the plus side, support is really fast on answering questions and addressing problems, however, I do not know how much of the feedback they use for improvement.
There is lots of potential in this ring, but some of the aspects really need atention.

Title: Great response to suggestions and improvement request feedback!
Content: Product worked very well; I wear it all the time except when charging. Excellent response for improved SP02 calibration in comparison to my FDA approved medical device. I was so happy with it I gave the first one to my son (I bought it as soon as it was available) and upgraded to the newest version. Well worth the money!

Title: Sleep apnea monitoring
Content: It have got a very good sleep apnea monitoring. Much lesser on activities and sports but very good for sleep monitoring and heart rate variability monitoring. It can even detect if u are going to be unwell for you to get more rest and recover.

Title: Well made
Content: Well made, good battery life

Title: It does not track sleep accurately
Content: It does not track sleep accurately

Title: Short battery life
Content: My ring only lasts 3 to 4 days on a full charge. The main reason I purchased this ring is because of the battery life. Very disappointing. I already wrote to customer service. I told them of the issue. They sent back some stuff I could try, but none of it worked.

Title: Great Company & Product
Content: I secured my first ring through the Ringconn2 kickstarter program. Loved the ring but unfortunately. I lost it after a couple of months. During the campaign and right through the loss of my ring, RingConn customer service was readily available and most helpful. They returned communication quickly, listened to my concerns and suggestions. and were professional. I did order a replacement ring with a discount and was very happy with the process. About 2 weeks after it was received, the company updated the ring/software with a "find me" feature. A little late to find my ring, but they listened and recognized a need and improved for their customers. WELL DONE!! Awaiting the update for blood sugar and blood pressure!

Title: Great customer support
Content:
Made a mistake with the order and they responded quickly and handled it for me.
Shipment came perfectly on time and i had no issues here.

Title: Love the ring and the app

Content:

Doug

Title: I bought two rings
Content:
I bought two rings. I can wear my ring a long time although I find it helpful to move it to the other hand.
But my wife’s experience isn’t going as well as mine. Rings should come in half sizes and be easily exchanged

Title: could be made of better quality and the…
Content: could be made of better quality and the app could be more user friendly but other than that it’s pretty accurate

Title: Excellent product
Content:
Excellent product. I t has been a great aid in resolving my sleeping issues.
The only recommendation would be to include fahrenheit with the temperatures.

Title: Love my ring
Content: I love the ring. It is lightweight and looks good. The battery lasts a long while and charges quickly. The data given is great. I do think the app could give some more insight and be upgraded but I still enjoy it.

Title: Good customer support/great Ring
Content: Good customer support, excellent product.

Title: It’s a dream to have this wonderful…
Content: It’s a dream to have this wonderful ring! With it it is very easy to check all my activities and even at night it measures also my body. Perfect!

Title: Missing component
Content: I wish there was a component that would track low intensity workout instead of solely going off of heart rate. I would like the technology to keep advancing though, please continue to update. It has a lot of potential!

Title: Ring definitely worth it!
Content: Ring works as advertised, is comfortable and lightweight, and seems quite accurate. Would highly recommend!

Title: Ok, but could be better
Content: Connectivity glitches sometimes leaving data gaps. I had some issues with ending walking exercise. I snowboard and indoor bike. There is no way to log this and heart shows as outliers when I do these activities. Sleep logging is frequently off recording reading time in bed as sleep or light sleep when my brain is churning. My REM sleep seems low no matter what I do so I have to wonder how accurate this thing really is. I recently had the flu and the device logged abnormal temperatures which would be explained by the flu rather than the suggestion that I may have a metabolic disorder. It seems like it would be simple to include an over health status log as well as regular weight tracking. You have a lot of potential in this device, but it could be so much better and useful.

Title: I just need to be able to sync this…
Content: I just need to be able to sync this with My Fitness Pal !

Title: My experience has been great!
Content: My experience has been great! After much research I am so glad I chose RingConn. Beautiful and light and the app is so easy to use, and no monthly fee! Highly recommend!

Title: After it finally arrived, good purchase
Content: After it finally arrived, I have worn it daily. Battery life is phenomenal! The interface is clean and simple to navigate. Comparing it with the Apple Watch and IFit biking monitor, it appears to be very accurate. I bought it specifically to track the improvements of my sleep apnea after dramatic weight loss. Overall a good quality product. Customer service is slow, as is order fulfillment, if these issues don’t bother you get it.

Title: It’s comfortable and stylish
Content: It’s comfortable and stylish! I love all the information it provides.

Title: Fast delivery and the ring is very…
Content: Fast delivery and the ring is very nice, and operates to my expectations. Great battery life and excellent vitals tracking. I wish there were more exercise option’s available for use!!

Title: This was a great purchase!
Content: I wish that we could rate in halves. This is a great ring so far, definitely a solid 4.5 stars to date. I’d like to have more control with changing parameters (step expectations, and better sleep tips…). The battery life is easily near two weeks making it great for trips away, we did purchase the charging base that easily lasts 14-15 separate charges. I purchased this for my wife, I’d definitely purchase another RingConn ring for myself if coupons were given with each purchase. I highly recommend this smart ring over the others as no monthly subscription is required and the app that comes with RingConn covers all the bases.

Title: Customer service
Content: After I hadn't heard that it was shipped for Christmas, I called and the person on other end made sure to track it down. I did receive it a day before Christmas. It was so important!! Great customer service!

Content: The ring seems to do a great job of tracking sleep. I find that it mostly tracks with my memory of each evening. I hope the heart rate and blood oxygen numbers are accurate as I am using those for tracking sleep apnea events. I would appreciate an easy way of getting the data to a computer for better and more detailed analysis. While I wear the ring all the time I do not find much value using it while walking and working out at the gym. My apple watch is easier to use and provides more functionality for these activities.

Title: The packing is great and very the…
Content: The packing is great and very the overall information is very informative. There are some aspects of the things the ring tracks that are confusing as it doesn’t really explain what it means.

Title: I really enjoy the RingConn 2
Content: I really enjoy the RingConn 2, but after comparing it to the Oura Ring 4 for over a month now, the difference in sleep detection is WAY off. Most often it will be off by 1-2 hours. I do notice the heart rate is very close to the Oura Ring 4 and Apple Watch, it is almost spot on with my pulse ox. Just my biggest complaint is the sleep detection, once I adjust the time manually the REM and Deep Sleep are about 90% of the time very similar to the Oura Ring 4. The one benefit of the RingConn 2 though is the no subscription, it is a one time buy and that’s it. For that, I have to change my original rating of 3 stars to 4 stars.

Title: Bought this for my wife and she no…
Content: Bought this for my wife and she no longer wears it. The ring does not measure accurately when she is working out.

Title: Ringconn is not very accurate
Content: Ring is not very accurate with steps and distance. Sleep monitoring often says I had a great night of sleep while in reality I struggled and was up all night. Not too happy with the product. Also wished it monitored more activities than just the three options. My Apple Watch does a better job so I’ll go back to wearing that.

Title: Incredible service
Content:
Incredible service, the sizing kit and the ring arrived on time to Mexico, all the package in good condition. The ring is so nice, I liked too much. RingConn is a good option too tried if you want price-quality.
The only thing is that the option to register training is limited to 4 options

The ring is perfect ! Beautiful and with a great app

I’m pleased by my new RingConn

Title: Superb Product

Title: Had a great experience with their…
Content:
Had a great experience with their customer service. My wife and I both had the same issue during the holidays as others that purchased gen 2 rings with gen 1 sizing kits (1 ring size difference). After explaining our issue the team went out of their way to send us the correct sizes and prepaid for the return shipment of the original rings.

We can’t be happier with the product’s performance and look forward to future enhancements.

Title: It’s been over a month and I still…
Content: It’s been over a month and I still haven’t received my ring

Title: I loved the first gen but gen2 is even…
Content: I loved the first gen but gen2 is even better! Enjoy the sleep data!

Title: great battery life
Content: great battery life, good interface and detailed information. also super light!!

Title: Super disappointed
Content: I loved the ring at first, loved the data and keeping track of my health. But after six months the battery will no longer hold a charge and it is basically useless. I contacted ringconn and they insist that I do a bunch of troubleshooting and track data for two weeks to prove that it’s not working. They refuse to replace it until I’ve done this, and I have my doubts that they will replace it even then. I guess that’s the risk you take when you try a new product that hasn’t been around long enough to really test. I’m so disappointed by the quality and lack of customer service.

Title: I just feel like this ring doesn’t do…
Content: I just feel like this ring doesn’t do as much as I thought. It tracks all the right things, but doesn’t always stay well connected to my phone which makes me question accuracy. Also a competitor has the option to be woken up when in light sleep rather than deep sleep and if that could be in the next update that would be huge for me. I would be open to more notifications too because I feel like I’ve only gotten them when the battery was dying. Which also doesnt seem to last as long as i expected, but i have only charged it once so far.

Title: The sleep tracking seems to be good and…
Content:
The sleep tracking seems to be good and the main reason I bought it. It looks good also and is fairly scratch resistant.

The heart rate portion is absolutely horrendous. I use a heart rate sensor when riding my bike and the ring is not even remotely close, like 100 BPM off when I'm on my bike - my ring thinks I need to move lol. It makes me wonder how good anything it recommends could be when the heart rate, which seems like a basic function, is off so bad.

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

The RingConn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has! I highly suggest this ring since there’s no monthly fee & the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the aSee more

Love the idea of the ring. Somethings to note. It gets scratched very easily and I'm not expecting it to look great a year from now. Also there are no postpartum or pregnancy setting for the fertilitySee more
Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: Keeps an accurate account of your body…
Content: Keeps an accurate account of your body and sleep

Title: Ring conn Gen 2 is fantastic recording…
Content: Ring conn Gen 2 is fantastic recording info for my medical needs.

Title: The ring and the information I receive…
Content: The ring and the information I receive from it is amazing. This is not a 5 star because getting started was not a pleasant experience. Better instructions for people who are not 'techy' would be much appreciated.

Title: RingConn is fantastic
Content: This ring tracks vital statistics and helps me understand what is going on with my health. It also motivates me to be more active and to pay attention to my sleep. It provides an at a glance view of how you are doing and it also has a more in depth view of each area. It shows what is considered normal so you can see if there are any potential problems. I highly recommend this for everyone.

Title: I love it!
Content: I love the ring! It's super lightweight so you barely notice you're wearing it, and the data is phenomenal! I was tired of having an extension of my phone on my wrist so I switched to an analog watch but still wanted to track my health stats, so this is the perfect solution! My only complaint is that I had no idea it was coming from Hong Kong (maybe that's my fault for not reading more details) so it took a whole month to get to me (I'm in Canada) since I didn't already know my size. If I had known my size, I think it would have taken half that time. But it was worth the wait!

Title: Within a week I was loving the RingConn…
Content: Within a week I was loving the RingConn Gen 2. I had been using an Apple Watch but could only wear it overnight because of iteration to skin. I can wear this ring all the time -- and then also can have it do Sleep Apnea assessment (which I have, but I like to track issues for when I'm not wearing my CPAP). No regrets. Definitely recommend.

Title: I am very happy with the ring
Content: I am very happy with the ring and the app. I really liked that the app includes Spanish in its language settings and is very clear. I love the product.

Title: Pleased
Content: I am basically very happy with the ring. It looks like, and provides more useful health info than my apple watch, and battery life is incredible.

Title: I upgraded from Gen 1 and WOW!!
Content: I upgraded from Gen 1 and WOW!!! This ring is so light and beautiful! I love the upgrade in accuracy/technology… I never take it off and it still makes it through weights and dishes!

Title: Great product and service
Content: Date of experience: November 18, 2024

Title: I wanted to keep track of my sleeping…
Content: I wanted to keep track of my sleeping patterns as well as steps each day. Don't know how to set it for all the features but it does a good job of giving the information I bought it for. Comfortable and nice looking.

Title: I miss more training Option
Content:
I miss more training Option. Cycling, Running , indoor Running an Vikings is to leas. What about gym, Yoga or pilates, horse riding….

The rest is fine

Title: Great product
Content: Harry Potter addict great shipping great customer service overall great

Title: Customer service did not respond to the…
Content: Customer service did not respond to the questions I asked. They responded, but with general responses. After lengthy delays in receiving my order, and no delivery in sight, I asked to cancel. they said they would refund a delivery fee. I had to ask them to refund the entire order fee since I never got my order from them.

Title: Info given by Ringconn App is very…
Content: Info given by Ringconn App is very relevant and is helping me be a healthier person. My quality of sleep has also greatly improved.

Title: Horrible
Content: Horrible. Never received my producer and eventually just canceled the order after about a month of waiting

Title: A Wealth of data
Content: A wealth of data but requires interpretation. As a physician I can piece together all the data and draw conclusions but I can see how people may find it difficult to interpret and find the UI complex.

Title: Not enough types of exercises to choose…
Content:
Not enough types of exercises to choose from. So the evaluation MAY NOT be accurate.
I swim 40 minutes on Monday, 40 minutes on Wednesday's and 40 minutes on Friday. Tuesdays, Thursdays and Sundays I exercise for 60 minutes on a Pilates Reformer Machine.
But, there is no place to inputting on the Ring Conn App

Title: Sleep Function is terrible has never…
Content: Sleep Function is terrible has never recorded over four hours in 2 weeks

Title: Love the in depth specific info.
Content: Love the in depth description of information. Sleep info even noticed my breathing difficulties due to allergies! I am amazed!

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: Great value
Content: Great value, ai need to be more integrated

Title: Message questions never get responce
Content: I've asked a number of times when will more workout routines be added, what is in future releases and what time frame. Never get a reply

Title: Doing what I wanted it to do
Content: Seems to be close to the steps count on my Garmin Vivoactive 5. I have sleep apnea and an Inspire implant and use an oxygen monitoring ring and this is another tool to monitor my sleep apnea and the ring seems to be capturing events. So far this has been a useful tool for the reasons I use it and is adding to my arsenal of health monitoring devices. I'm happy with it and my husband will probably get a Gen 2 ring, also.

Title: My ring has been out for delivery for…
Content: My ring has been out for delivery for many days and I have not gotten a satisfactory explanation

Title: Got it for sleep tracking and it works…
Content: Got it for sleep tracking and it works great. Also the silver looks nice. Only gripe is that the ring is slightly bigger than the sizing ring and there are no returns or exchanges. However fit is okay. A little loose but stays on

Title: Thank you for the product that…
Content: Thank you for the product that stimulates healthy roles and we hope you will add exercises and recovery status.

Title: Good Overview
Content: Good Overview, helpful information and analytics

Title: Does not work
Content: Does not work. would like to return

Title: Love my Gen 2
Content: So far so good as I haven’t had it long. The data is comprehensive & the app is easy to use. The feedback is great & I am adjusting my day accordingly to the information I receive. I’m really enjoying it!

Title: I compare Garmin Instinct 2X Solar a…
Content: I compare Garmin Instinct 2X Solar a RingConn gen2. Sleep and steps are better count with Ringconn.

Title: Great Ring, unique sizing, not so good shipping
Content: The ring is fantastic with amazing tracking abilities. I love that it tracks pretty much everything my smart watch does, but in a small package that doesn’t stand out. The fit is a little disappointing, because of sensors and shape I had to get a 14, I’m a 12-12.5 normally, since there are no half sizes I find myself switching fingers throughout the day as my fingers change. The one BIG let down from me was shipping. The site said 5-7 days for the sizer, but nothing on the ring itself. I paid for expedited shipping and it took 2 weeks to get!!! How long is normal shipping? If you can’t expedite at least refund the extra shipping fee, or notify the customer. It took a week from the package tag being created to even leave Hong Kong!

Title: I like the ring but wish it had more…
Content: I like the ring but wish it had more types of exercises to choose from. The list is very limited.

Title: Great ring
Content: The ring sizer came right away. Then the ring came within days of my order. I love the ring and the app is easy to use. It gives me great information! My only disappointment was that it didn't come in rose gold, which I really wanted. Then found out it was released 2 weeks after I got mine. Gggrrr. I wish they would have given the release date in advance.

Title: awesome, does exactly what I want it to do
Content:
Bought it because I wanted something small & minimalistic to track my heartrate (during normal life and exercise), and it is exactly what I wanted & expected. I have not yet found a part I do not like.

Would be nice if I could integrate it more in my android (add the ring-power to the status bar or add some information on my lock-screen) but that's not a must and imo not the fault of Ringconn :D

Title: Response time
Content: I got a response once every 24 hours, sometimes even 48 hours so it took forever for me to get my ring exchanged.

Title: There's a lot of information with your…
Content: There's a lot of information with your ring and I'm still trying to navigate the info.

Title: Great device, but needs some improvements
Content: I like the ring, and I'm comparing it to previous Oura, witch to be honest it's much more expensive. So the app is nice with a lot of data, the design has place for improvement however. What I don't like is how nap detection works, sometimes it does some time it doesn't and you either sleep for 30, 45, 60 minutes, it's never between.

Title: Top notch customer service
Content:
This is the second ring I’ve bought. The first was for my wife who is extremely pleased with it. This second one is for me. Truth be told, l had a lot of problems receiving it. Indeed somewhere along the shipment line it must have got lost. However the customer service was absolutely top notch and after having made the necessary verifications a new one was sent out. Very kind and friendly service.
As for the ring itself, the info is very useful and interesting to have and actually makes a difference to some habits one might have.
Very good!

Title: Straight crap
Content: Straight crap doesn’t even hold a charge for a whole day. We’ve tried letting it sit on the charger overnight before wearing it for and it dies so fast. Even tried to reset/reboot and still dies so fast. I spent money on this product over a year ago for about $300 when the Black Friday deal was going on. Now it won’t even charge at all. Died after three hours of wear today and it’s been sitting on the block for a few hours and nothing. Straight crap and disappointed on wasting my money on this.

Title: Great product with on demand features
Content: Great product with needing the on demand O2 measurement and heart rate as well. Good response for inquiries on ring. App easy to understand and work. Hoping for BP measurement in future updates.

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

The RingConn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has! I highly suggest this ring since there’s no monthly fee & the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the aSee more

Love the idea of the ring. Somethings to note. It gets scratched very easily and I'm not expecting it to look great a year from now. Also there are no postpartum or pregnancy setting for the fertilitySee more
Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: RingConn Gen 2 - Fantastic Ring!
Content: Fantastic product - the RingConn Gen 2 was received quickly as well as the sizing kit (over Christmas/New Year). The actual ring is great, data gathering is excellent and very durable (hardly a scratch in 3 weeks of daily wearing). Only issue for Australia is the use of Aramex for postage, and they did not require signature for delivery, so just had to be aware throughout the planned day of delivery.

Title: Battery life and the software is pretty…
Content: Battery life and the software is pretty good. What I would like to see added, are links to other fitness and health apps, such as Strava. For example, if I ride a peloton bike indoors, there's no way to tell the ring as only three sports are listed.

Title: In accurate HR data during exercise + extremely difficult exchange approval process
Content: In accurate HR data during exercise. HR measured does not go above 110 bpm, when I am obviously breathless, and Apple Watch measures 170 bpm. I also purchased another ring for someone else and needed an exchange - it was exceptionally difficult to get an exchange approved and to get shipping label for return, as well as to receive the tracking number of the new ring. I had to jump through a lot of hoops to get what I needed, it was very unnecessary and a bad way to run a business.

Title: I was still able to order a ring when…
Content: I was still able to order a ring when it was being discontinued

Title: Sleep monitoring is good, activity monitoring not so good.
Content:
The sleep monitoring seems to be very accurate.
And the information the app shows in every aspect is very important in order to make changes and adjustments to your lifestyle.

I just wish there were more options of monitoring your data while one is working out,
I don t run outdoors nor do i do any cycling(which are the main activity monitoring modes) but i do the elyptical machine indoors, and other physical exercises, that the ring cannot fully translate as a work out session sometimes, the step measuring does not seem to be fully accurate also.

Title: Excellent device with some areas to improve
Content:
It's an amazing device but still room for improvement. Some areas to improve are:
-More exercise options like rowing
-Automatic exercise detection
-Connect to other devices to improve accuracy, devices like under mattress sleep tracker, blood pressure monitoring or smart watches and alike
-More skins for example wood or engraving on metal sheet
Positive advantage
- smaller size
- battery
- no subscription
- battery case
- value for money
- excellent sizing kit exact replica of ring

Title: Arrived fast
Content: Arrived fast. I am very pleased with the ring and the info it gives. Exactly what I was looking for.

Title: Game-Changer for Smart Wearables! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Content:
I’ve been using the Ringcom Smart Ring for a few weeks now, and I’m beyond impressed! The design is sleek, lightweight, and incredibly comfortable—I often forget I’m even wearing it. The health tracking features are spot on, providing accurate insights into my heart rate, sleep patterns, and activity levels.

What really sets this ring apart is its seamless integration with my devices. The battery life is outstanding, lasting several days on a single charge, and the app interface is intuitive and easy to navigate.

If you’re looking for a stylish and functional alternative to bulky smartwatches, the Ringcom Smart Ring is a must-have. Highly recommend!

Title: Really enjoying my ring
Content: Really enjoying my ring. The sleep app is very helpful along with my vital signs. Love to see those Steps add up as well

Title: First impressions after a couple of weeks.
Content: The battery life if great as you only need to charge every one to two weeks. The RingConn team got back with me in a reasonable amount of time when I submitted question through the app. I would like to see improvements in the indoor activity tracking as it is not as accurate as I expected. The ring fit and comfort is great and I look forward to future app updates.

Title: Great customer service
Content: Date of experience: January 15, 2025

Title: My ring simply doesn't accurately track…
Content:
Based on my experiences over the past two weeks of continuous use—both during the day and at night—I have some concerns about the RingConn's activity tracking accuracy. Specifically, I've noticed that the sleep tracking data appears to be significantly off. For example, on the first two nights, despite getting nearly 7 hours of sleep, the app recorded only about half that duration. I initially expected that ongoing use might help refine the sleep tracking algorithm, but so far, the nightly data has not improved.

For additional context, I primarily wear the ring on my left index finger, and occasionally on my middle finger, where it fits perfectly. As a comparison, I monitored my sleep with an Apple Watch, which consistently recorded around 7 hours of sleep each night. This contrast between the two devices leads me to question the overall reliability of the RingConn in tracking sleep and daily activity accurately.

Title: Customer service is the very best
Content: Customer service is the very best. I was able to communicate by phone and email.

Title: Poor customer service after initial order
Content:
They sent me the wrong size, made me jump through all these hoops to return it, including 2 different photo shoots of the product days apart. I’ve been emailing asking for them to send me the size I ordered, been about a month now. Still no new one on the way.
The customer service after the initial order is terrible!!!!

Title: So far so good!
Content: I love the battery life, the look, and how easy it is to read the summaries. However, I do wish that there are more exercises you can select from. That is the only downside I see so far.

Title: had 1st generation and batter would not…
Content: had 1st generation and batter would not hold a charge sent me 2nd generation for a discount price

Title: Very responsive and helpful
Content: Very responsive and helpful

Title: One of the best purchases I have made!
Content: My RingConn took me to the next fitness level. It has really helped me to understand my sleep and exercise patterns. It is comfortable and stylish. Great product!!

Title: To get the ring it took forever to ship
Content: To get the ring it took forever to ship and receive. Unfortunately the size was wrong and had to send back to get it exchanged. Today it’s been almost 2 weeks since I started my return process and still haven’t received a notification saying it’s been shipped. Incredible and ridiculous the amount of time you guys take to send customers their orders.

Title: A great buy
Content: I am very much satisfied

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more
