Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: I mean you weren't able to fix my…
Content: I mean you weren't able to fix my problem but did allow me to return the ring. However it's been a day and I'm still waiting the return label that i was told would be sent to me. 🤷‍♀️

Title: great customer service communication
Content: Date of experience: January 14, 2025

Title: Great experience so far
Content: Great experience so far! As it collects more of my data its insights are getting more accurate. The platform is fairly intuitive, and the AI feature has potential.

Title: Exceeded my expectations
Content: The ring is comfortable, reliable and informative. I have been really impressed by how well it tracks my data and I am now using the ring instead of my Apple Watch. I have been particularly impressed by how it sets my daily goals and tracks my sleep quality. The only thing that could be improved is how well it tracks my exercise.

Title: I love this ring
Content: I love this ring, is small easy to wear and cool health tracking, I wish the app has a partner with other app or an option to include daily meals to find a way to track vitamins/etc. and how could I improve on my meals.

Title: I really like the ring
Content:
I really like the ring. It is comfortable and most of the time I either don't know its there, or it gives me something to fidget with.

I do wish the values has a little more information to understand them better. You get a stress reading, but how is it determined?

The sleep is pretty accurate for me.

Activity is accurate but while doing activity the heart rate function doesn't seem very accurate.

Overall a good product and I'm enjoying it.

Title: It îs a long time from demand to…
Content: It îs a long time from demand to receive the ring.

Title: Sleep Tracking Rocks
Content: I have had my ring for two weeks now and am very happy with it. I recently had major surgery and was concerned that my sleep was sub par. My Gen1 ring has proven that my sleep is better than I thought. I am very active around our property and the rings' finish has been extremely durable. I would by this smart ring again!!

Title: Love the ring!
Content: Love the ring! Goes into pretty good detail however, I would love an update similar to the ultra human which tells you your reasoning for stress and recommendations for caffeine intake accordingly. Also lacking different types of activities to select from which is something I was unfortunately expecting but have not seen.

Title: Data is accurate
Content: Data is accurate, ring looks great, price is right, excellent app and best of all no monthly subscription.

Title: The ring works great
Content: The ring works great. App is thorough and easy to use. Holds charge several days.

Title: RingCon is a SCAM
Content:
I would never purchase an item from this company again and will do anything within my power to urge anyone I know in the wellness spectrum to do the same.

I was assured I would have a ring available in my girlfriend’s size for Christmas. I paid and made the order and then was told the day after Christmas they are no longer making her size or model. This was not communicated clearly. Judging from your instagram page it seems I am not alone in my plight.

Title: Good ring with lots of insight
Content: Shipping took a little longer than expected, but everything was well packaged. The ring is good and the app is user friendly with a lot of insight! The sizing kit is accurate to the ring as well. The ring itself is very lightweight, I hardly know I’m wearing it. I think it’s a great alternative to Oura (I could not justify the price and monthly subscription) and this ring seems to do it all without as high of a price tag!

Title: Vital stats
Content: I bought the ring for tracking vital statistics and sleeping information. It has given me some interesting insights.

Title: Well worth the price
Content: I wanted a smart ring because I can’t stand to sleep with my smart watch on. I received a ring for Christmas but it was a cheaper one. It worked for a few days then wouldn’t connect to my phone at all. I researched and decided on this RingConn. I have had a great experience with it and I love all the information it gathers for me. I highly recommend it.

Title: This ring is awsome
Content:
This ring is awsome. It gives informations not just about how many steps a day I make but also gives informations on sleep apnea, mood, stress etc...
It might not be exact on the steps I make depending on what i'm doing but it makes me want to move, walk, exercise and that's good for my health.
And the charge last for at least 7 days so I can wear it all day long. I am really satisfied.

Title: Pro and cons
Content:
The sleep tracking is quite accurate and stable compared with many other trackers. The heart rate monitor too.
The app is just right, simple and not overwhelming.
It doesn't feel bulky wearing it.
The step tracking is actually very bad, sometimes I get up in the morning, I get to the kitchen and I have 300 steps counted.
The exercises are very very limited, there is nothing about anaerobic exercises such as bodyweight.
I hate the fact that I need the charger to exit airplane mode, in 2025 it shouldn't be. I can't wear it while welding ( which is a big part of my job) and my phone drains the battery looking for the ring, if I put it in airplane mode I need to bring the charger with me, but most of smart ring wearers do it because of the very small size of it and if I need to bring the charger at work it loses part of the porpoise.
Overall a great product.

Title: Great product
Content: Great product, excellent service and fast delivery

Title: Great info from a ring-love it!
Content: Provides all the information I want, sleep data, vital signs including oxygen saturation and steps. I also love the sleep apnea data. I had a Garmin forerunner 55 but I find the ring more comfortable. I wore both the ring and watch for 4 days and the stats from both were comparable.

Title: Excelente dispositivo
Content: Excelente dispositivo

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

The RingConn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has! I highly suggest this ring since there’s no monthly fee & the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the aSee more

Love the idea of the ring. Somethings to note. It gets scratched very easily and I'm not expecting it to look great a year from now. Also there are no postpartum or pregnancy setting for the fertilitySee more
Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: My ring finally arrived and the…
Content: My ring finally arrived and the packaging was impressive! It’s early days but so far I am very pleased with the overall functionality and supporting application. Key to greater usefulness going forward will be the addition of a much wider range of activities for tracking. Ideally, the ring could sense activity levels and start tracking on its own? Hopefully the company doesn’t make the mistake of its predecessors and start to try and figure out how to get more money out of us with subscriptions unless there is significant value add.

Title: Great product
Content: Bought this as a birthday gift for my husband who is 79. Gives me great piece of mind knowing we can check his phone for all of his vitals!! Would highly recommend.

Title: Easy to use
Content: Easy to use, lots of info

Title: Thin and Light Fitness Ring
Content:
this ring is so thin and light compared to others on the market and battery lasts for days i love it! perfect for what i was looking for with cheaper and thinner ring without a subscription, but still great quality

the only thing I will say though is that it is a pretty bright/brassy yellow gold color rather than some of the real gold I have, but honestly not that annoying

Title: Great customer service
Content: Great customer service. I had to exchange my ring because I accidentally ordered the wrong size. The return and exchange was easy. Customer service got back to me within 24 hours after sending email.

Title: The ring fascinated me
Content: The ring fascinated me. I think the ring is better than a smartwatch, especially because of its versatility and the fact that it looks more like a piece of jewelry than a biometric device. The battery life is spectacular, the app is very useful, and they are constantly updating it. The time to receive the ring is approximately one month. There are two packages: first, the sizing trial rings arrive, and finally the actual ring, so you need to be patient, but the wait is worth it.

Title: Still assessing my new RingConn 2
Content: Still assessing my new RingConn 2. Overall, and everything has been fine. The walking exercise app showed that I "walked" through fences and neighbors houses on a circular route. It also dropped a significant portion of my bike ride.

Title: As a backer of the Kickstarter…
Content:
As a backer of the Kickstarter campaign, I had ordered a 2nd ring for me.
Now, months of daily use, me and my wife a very happy with the rings as they are working as expected.
Overall, rings and accessories are from good quality and easy usage. Shipping was OK, support answers quite fast.

Title: The HRV does not seem normal
Content: The HRV does not seem normal. My Apple 9 watch shoes a totally different heart rate. Other people say the same thing. The apple watch is more accurate. Please fix this and your ring is definitely a five star. Both my wife and I have a Ringconn.

Title: Easy to purchase
Content: Easy to purchase and fairly good response times. Sizing kit is excellent. The app requires it to remain open to send notifications. Took some guessing to figure it out with Android. Took several months before the ring learned my movements and sleep patterns to start accurately tracking.

Title: Great experience so far
Content:
Great experience so far! RingConn is a solid company, Im loving the product and definitely will keep using it until I can’t anymore!
RingConn’s community and communication is great, the product is top notch technology, and I could order accessories easily.

Title: Love the product
Content: Love the product, love the data, love the app is getting updates, and love the lack of subscription fees.

Title: Horrible Customer Service
Content:
Terrible customer service! When I attempted to cancel my order before it was shipped the obstacles were enormous. It took 6 weeks going back and forth, and I was made to come up with all kinds of justification why this wasn’t the product I wanted.
If you must get this smart ring order it through Amazon and hope you don’t need any after purchase customer service support.

Title: Best smart ring
Content:
Amazing Innovation – The RingCon Smart Ring is a Game-Changer!

I recently purchased the RingCon Smart Ring, and it has completely exceeded my expectations. This innovative device seamlessly blends style, functionality, and advanced technology into a sleek, wearable gadget that has quickly become an essential part of my daily life.

Compact Yet Powerful

Despite its small size, the RingCon Smart Ring offers a wide array of features. From fitness tracking to health monitoring, it delivers accurate and reliable data, all at the tip of your finger—literally! It’s hard to believe how much technology is packed into such a lightweight and comfortable accessory.

Health and Fitness Tracking

The fitness tracking capabilities are outstanding. It tracks heart rate, steps, calories burned, and even sleep patterns with impressive accuracy. I love waking up and checking the detailed breakdown of my sleep cycle, which has helped me make significant improvements to my routine.

Seamless Connectivity

Pairing the ring with my smartphone was quick and effortless. The app is intuitive, with a clean interface that makes it easy to access insights and reports. Notifications and alerts from my phone are subtle yet effective, ensuring I stay connected without the constant distraction of checking my device.

Stylish Design

The RingCon Smart Ring is as stylish as it is functional. Its sleek, minimalist design makes it perfect for everyday wear, whether I’m at the gym, at work, or out for the evening. It doesn’t feel bulky or intrusive, and I’ve received countless compliments on its modern aesthetic.

Battery Life That Impresses

One of the standout features is the impressive battery life. A single charge lasts several days, which is incredibly convenient. I never feel tied down by constant charging, which is a huge bonus for any wearable device.

Durability and Comfort

The ring is made with high-quality materials that are not only durable but also comfortable for all-day wear. I barely notice it on my finger, and it holds up well to daily activities, including workouts and washing my hands.

Why I Recommend It

The RingCon Smart Ring is the perfect combination of practicality, style, and cutting-edge technology. Whether you’re looking to improve your health, stay connected, or simply own an innovative piece of tech, this ring is a fantastic choice.

Final Thoughts

RingCon has truly outdone itself with this smart ring. It has quickly become a staple in my routine, and I can’t imagine going back to life without it. If you’re on the fence about purchasing one, I wholeheartedly recommend giving it a try. You won’t regret it!

Five stars for this incredible product!

Title: Buyer Beware
Content: Hello Everyone, I was one of the original backers of RingConn. For us Ringcon promised a 2 year warranty. My ring has stopped working correctly after a year and half and now needs to be charged daily. They have said/admited that this should not happen and it is a warranty issue. They have really handled my defective ping poorly. They offered only $110 towards a Gen2 ring which is a joke. When I said no they offered to send me a new gen 1 ring. Both options are not good but at least the gen 1 replacement is better. I accepted that option. Now they're saying they don't have it and not sure when they will and they just expect me to wait. I've also read they are not manufacturing any more Gen 1 rings so it seems they just hope this will go be forgotten and go away. This is crazy. I have asked them to escalate this issue but I can feel the pushback like afraid to escalate to a manager. Also, it's sometimes days at a time before I receive a response back from them. The rings are not cheap as we all know. They have handled this very poorly and in my mind unacceptable if they were a reputable company.

Title: Love this ring! - from a newbie smart ring owner
Content: Ring is extremely well-made, with comfortable slim fit, much less bulky than any other ring on the market. Fit is slightly different than sizing kit, but this is most likely due to the smooth, slick internal coating of the ring versus the plastic material of the sizer. Comfortable to wear all day and all night. I find that the app is well-made, and although the app update changed the look of the main metrics page, it is intuitive and appears pretty accurate, particularly from a sleep tracking perspective. And the sleep score is extremely helpful--even when I get adequate or at least better length of sleep, I can associate my quality of rest accurately with a good or bad sleep score. Nap auto-detection is particularly impressive. I only wish workout detection was automatic and there were more options for workout types.

Title: Maybe I expect too much for the price…
Content:
Maybe I expect too much for the price point the outer ring is very cheap and scratches easy. Should be a more durable material such as stainless steel or titanium.

The metrics are good and very accurate when compared with my Garmin watch. I would Iove to see more metrics if it's possible.

Title: Great ring but software could be improved
Content:
I love my RingConn ring. As I also own the gen 3 Oura ring I feel that I can provide a meaningful perspective.

Pros: RingConn has a slimmer profile, longer battery life, and best of all, no monthly fee. In addition, I have a rare limitation in that the Oura ring doesn't accurately read my heart rate, while both gen 1 and gen 2 versions of the RingConn read my heart rate flawlessly.

Cons: Where RingConn falls short is that some of the software aspects are not quite as good as Oura. For example, Oura has much better accuracy at reading when I'm awake vs being asleep. Many times where the RingConn shows me sleeping, the Oura accurately recognized that I was awake and reading a book. Another area where RingConn falls short is that there is no integration with partner software, so it doesn't recognize workouts I might have done that are recorded on Strava and Apple Health.

The RingConn app is good with lots of useful information. I find that the AI aspect is not very useful and gets in the way of just looking at the data. In contrast, Oura has a slightly more meaningful UI that makes it easier to understand the data presented.

Overall I can recommend the RingConn. It's solid, reliable and the lack of a monthly membership fee is a welcome benefit.

Title: I have had the rings for sometime now…
Content:
I have had the rings for sometime now both gen 1 and 2. The timings and information provided are quite accurate and informative. I seem to be having connectivity issues with the G2 as it is disconnecting more often than the G1 would. The largest size ring 14 is a little tight for my hand but that's not a big deal,larger size would be great. Overall very pleased with performance and data collected.
Pros: light weight,aesthetics good,accurate readings,app easy,battery life good.
Cons: random disconnect, reset through charger,size for me personally need larger,has on occasions connected to random phone of friend( no data transfer to random phone though) mindful of scratching when using weight exercise( normal with any ring).
I would and have highly recommended this health tracker as accurate and worth the cost.

Title: Good... could be better
Content: Would be nice to offer more colors, perhaps the silver, but not so shinny. The silicone sleeves are a joke, they only last 3-4 weeks before tearing and ripping. At that point the ring starts to really wear and get scratched up.

Title: Great communication prior to receiving…
Content: Great communication prior to receiving the actual ring. Upon receipt the ring fit , looked great, it's works as advertised including super long battery life (8 days). Very pleased with the RingConn

Content: Although the initial test kit took a month to arrive, which was quite disappointing, the actual actual I ordered arrived on time. The product itself is excellent—I’m absolutely loving it! The size, weight, and comfort are awesome.

I didn't understand the SW well enough when i first tired it so I need to re-test, but I think it gave a pretty accurate assessment. I tend to "chill" in the evening and apparently the ring sometimes counts me as sleeping at that point - probably my only disappointment so far. Not sure what I think of the "AI" yet. I suppose it is helpful to some. Very happy that there is no subscription!!

I wake up sleepy after 9 h and have information that I slept 5.

Title: Working

Title: My experience has been great
Content: My experience has been great. I was excited why I found out at the ringcon2 and preorders from kick starter. So how I did receive my email/code to preorder on their site. I reached out them think it would be to late and sorry we can't do anything type of response. To my surprise it was literally the opposite. They seemed genuinely sorry that I didn't get the emails/links. Even know it was still past the time they created a link/code that allowed me to still get the presale deal. But then they also followed up to make sure it worked for me and I was able to do. That is what I called amazing customer service. As for the ring it's self I'm in love with it. My wife has the Samsung ring and my sister has the Aura. I have better battery life and I like interface better also. Great product and amazing customer service. I will say to be transparent the one thing I do not like is the ring protector. I've tried two different sizes to see if I maybe grow to liking it. Nope sorry. It made the ring seem bulky and cheap. That's saying a lot saying this ring is smaller then the others. I have large hands and it's the perfect size. It's not so tiny thits dainty but not large. It's like the perfect size for for anyone. Sorry guys about ring protector just have to be honest. Otherwise customer for life and recommend the ring hands down. I got my then end of October and have worn it everyday but 1 day.

Title: The ring caused burn marks on my…
Content: The ring caused burn marks on my finger. When I asked for a refund, they kept going about telling them more about what the problem is. I’ve sent photos and explained to them over many emails what the problem is, they kept on delaying the process. They don’t want any returns. Just honor your return policy. I would’ve loved to keep the ring but for the love of god, I won’t wear something that burns my skin and possibly cause veins to blood clot.

The app is easy to use, and it’s provided me with a fair amount of information regarding my sleep patterns and general health status. So far I have no issues and no complaints with this product. Title: Amazing ring
Content:
First, I'll start with the obvious. The battery life is amazing. You have to think so seldom about it while it collects the data. Second, the fit is wonderful. Much thinner than the test ring. I usually hate rings, but this one just found a permanent home. Have gotten so many compliments. I've only had it for a month, but haven't scratched or scuffed it yet. Connectivity always works (which is refreshing).

On the it's ok side is the app. Some elements are great others are annoying. I actually liked the app version I started with much more than the current version. They updates a week or so in and it was disappointing. The plan and AI elements are more in the way for me now. Most of this tech is new, so it's likely to improve.

Overall the hardware is exactly what I wanted. I'm so glad to go with ringconn over oura and I've ditched my Fitbit.

Title: RingConn
Content: I love the ring itself. It works well and hold a great charge. Love the color!

Title: I love my RingConn!
Content:
I love my RingConn!
Battery lasts forever, seems accurate enough, and is quite durable so far (I'm accident prone and always hit my hands against things - no issues for my RingConn so far (and I don't use the crappy plastic protector).
Only downside: the size of the ring is very noticeable at first. I wish it were slightly thinner.
I like the app however it's a little "clunky"; I don't feel like it flows as well as other apps and you can definitely tell that English is not the primary language of this app. It's good - just nitpicking as it could be better.
I love my RingConn though and do not regret my purchase.

Title: Hassle free monitoring of your health
Content:
I finally switched to RingConn from Oura. I had Oura for about a year before finally trying RingConn. Initially I'm very used to Oura's user friendly display but Oura comes with monthly subscription which I feel is a hassle. RingConn on the other hand is single purchase and you get daily monitoring as long as you have it on. When RingConn started monitoring Sleep Apnea I decided to give it a try. To my surprise RingConn also updated their software to be more user friendly.

So far I'm liking RingConn and I hope that it will continue to upgrade the software to be more userfriendly.

Title: Sleep Times added with no edit available to delete
Content: There have been a few times where the sleep logging is showing naps and a Sleep #2 on the app. Most time when the adds a nap you can edit or delete, which is no problem but when it happens more than it should, you sleep vitals are not so accurate. On occasion I get a Sleep #2, that I did not take and when it goes to edit, the times are only adjusted within three and no changes can made or deleted

Title: My gen1 ring died on the same day the…
Content: My gen1 ring died on the same day the gen2 became available in an upgrade promotion. I don't believe in coincidences like that. After inordinate amount of sending pictures and videos I was able to prove the charge case had failed...we can send you a new charger, or you can wait a few weeks for your new gen 2 ring. Not great service because I'd prefer to be on the gen 1, but it is dead and in the trash bin...(Upgrade activation killed gen1, so can't pass along my dollar investment to my wife or son.

Content: Customer service is very slow at responding, I had to email multiple times and call multiple times. Even when called, I would be on hold for over 1 hour. They do not take returns for inaccurate data and just keep pointing you to leave feedback yet that doesn’t change the data accuracy.

Title: Very concise & informative
Content: Very concise & informative

Title: Great potential. Is there an API?
Content: Battery life is great. Software is evolving in good in direction, but shows promise. Is there an API for working with it?

Title: for my first ring, very well
Content: it's just few days that I have the ring, but I can say that it's very beautiful to see and wear. Data seems fairly correct. I don't give five stars because I think that the steps are not perfectly calculated. It seems too many also if i don't walk so much. very well designed and light.

Title: Poor customer service
Content: Poor customer service: I was unhappy with the 2nd generation ring in silver as it is shiny, (the first gen is matte and has held up well). The company refused to exchange my ring for a black one (which is matte) and gave contradictory information about the silver one I purchased: it's been tested and is highly scratch resistant. It may scratch, so wear the plastic (uncomfortable) ring protector. It's still in the box.

Title: Satisfied professional
Content: I've supported the initial ring on Kickstarter and am so satisfied that I've upgraded to the next-generation ring. The metrics that the ring measures are comprehensive and accurate (I'm a consultant physician). I see progressive improvements to the app and firmware that bring new features. I've never experienced any glitches. Most satisfying is the long battery life and lack of subscription.

Title: Couldn’t be happier!
Content: After a lot of research, I chose the Ringconn gen 2 and am so happy I did! Love, love, love that no subscription is required to get all the data. Steps don’t match my smart Watch, but have always questioned its accuracy and think the ring is probably more accurate. Got it mainly to track sleep and find it very comfortable to wear (played around with the sizing kit to choose the best finger and size for comfort and am very pleased). Once size was submitted, the ring arrived very quickly. The app paired with my phone easily and is very easy to navigate. Love only having to charge weekly!

Title: Over promised- under delivered
Content:
Over promised- under delivered
Horrific company!

Bought on Kickstarter where they promised a delivery date which was then delayed by over 2 months. Essentially they had problems with fulfillment with certain sizes. There was no communication on this until I chased with 20 or so emails back and forth with 'customer service' where they eventually said I would receive a refund with 30 days. Emailed them after 30 days as still no refund. I then magically receive an email saying you refund is being processed. Why did I not receive that email initially? I'll now wait another 10 days for the refund to appear.

Title: Customer Service is NOT a Priority
Content: I didn’t get my discount on either of my 2 purchases for upgrading to the “Gen2”. I’ve been a loyal customer that has referred no less than 4 customers to buy your product. I did everything correctly but then switched to pay via PayPal which has a different email address. Customer service like this is NOT A GOOD SIGN!! I now have a problem with my ring and am awaiting on FEEDBACK I sent on Sunday!!

Title: The Gen 2 is amazing
Content: The Gen 2 is amazing. Light, comfortable and looks great. I love the long battery life as well and the new app. Great job guys

Title: The ring is great, but change it to show "Total Calories again!"
Content:
The ring is great, 5 out of 5 and I really like the user interface, until the recent update, that's why the downgrade to 4 stars! It is much more responsive than the Oura ring (had 2 of them), love the extended 10-12 days of battery life (I have the Gen 2 RingConn).
However, you changed the interface to show the KCAL Activity Calories vs. "Total Carlories!" Most people including me, want to see how many "Total Calories," so we can adjust what we eat, etc. Activity Calories is good, but is not nearly as helpful in my opinion. I've never met anyone that has referred to, "I burned 300 KCAL activity calories vs. I burned 2500 Total Calories for example." Please change it back!!!

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

The RingConn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has! I highly suggest this ring since there’s no monthly fee & the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the aSee more

Love the idea of the ring. Somethings to note. It gets scratched very easily and I'm not expecting it to look great a year from now. Also there are no postpartum or pregnancy setting for the fertilitySee more
Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: Amazing Smart Ring really good value…
Content: Amazing Smart Ring really good value and App is great with new features added often. Plus no subscription cost! Definitely recommend - ring is attractive and light, seems fine with water as often forget to remove when washing hands. Stats seem fairly accurate and love the level of detail given for activity, stress, sleep and heart etc.

Title: User interface is need to improve
Content: User interface and graphics is need to improve. Charging case changing percentage not included in the new update please add that also. More in-depth analysis is needed

Title: The ring gets 5 stars
Content: The ring gets 5 stars, customer service gets 4 stars. The Gen2 with the updated AI feature really gives useful data. I have not turned on the sleep apnea function at this point. The Gen2 ring is lighter, thinner and very comfortable. I bought the wrong size (1 size too large) so must use a ring sizer pad to have it fit properly. Customer service would not exchange it.

Title: The team has been extremely supportive…
Content: The team has been extremely supportive and great in giving response quickly. I had some concerns about the size that I had offer first ordered and immediately mailed the team they supported and changing and all alternate solutions that they can provide. The product has been a great experience, adding to even the customer service provided when required was brilliant.

Title: Really good company
Content: Really good company, great customer service people! I made a mistake on a RingConn order. Called the number provided, received quick helpful answers solving issue. Enjoy my 2nd gen ring even more than the first. 2nd is accurate, more informative, much more comfortable than the 1st gen. Thoroughly enjoying getting healthier with RingConn!

Title: Ring is good
Content:
Ring is good. Data from the ring are ok, it's not Nasa, but good.
Software needs to be better, simpler and better. They will get there I'm sure. I don't regret my purchase.

Title: The answer was fast and clear
Content: The answer was fast and clear, still waiting the delivery

Title: Gen 2 is #1
Content: I am enjoying my gen 2 ring even more than i did my first ring. it is so easy to pair up and begin using. i am very satisfied with my purchase. Thank you Ringconn

Title: Very accurate tracking
Content: Very accurate tracking, great battery life, convenient and comfortable. The app continues to improve, but needs a bit more depth. Solid product. Recommended!

Title: I love everything about my RingConn!
Content:
I love everything about my RingConn!
I love that there is no charge for the app.
I love how light the ring is compared to the Ora ring.
I love how it gives me detailed information about my sleep such as my rem sleep , deep sleep , heart rate , and light sleep among other details.
The first thing I check in the morning is my sleep score.
This has helped me with getting to bed at an earlier time and has helped me cut way back on alcohol because it drastically affects your sleep score.
When I drink wine or stay up to late my sleep score is in the 60’s and my deep sleep and rem sleep are less than an hour.
Otherwise it’s in the high 80’s and mid 90’s and my deep sleep and rem sleep are over 2 hours each.
I love that it tracks all my steps without having to have my phone attached to me.
The only downside is ,it took 7 weeks for me to receive it. I guess it comes from overseas . It was definitely worth the wait . I love it!

Title: Ring that never arrived
Content:
After making a purchase, I've been waiting over a month for a ring that never arrived. Supposedly sent on 21.10, track has been lost on 29.10 somewhere in Holland. RingConn didn't resolve it, did not send another piece, and could not even say when it would be sent. I got the feeling that the company forced me to cancel as the price for the ring has been raised lately, so it's better for RingConn to sell a piece for $387 to another person instead of sending it to me, as I took faith in the company and made a preorder. So I've cancelled the order and now I am waiting for my money to be returned.
Contact is artificial and lacks real information. Very bad experience, I cannot recommend buying from RingConn from anyone from my friend, unless they surprise me by something in the end.

Title: App language
Content: I would appreciate the app in italian language too please.

Title: I like the sleep tracker
Content: I like the sleep tracker. Unfortunately the choice of exercises is small. I miss swimming, gym workout, Pilates, Yoga

Title: Great product
Content: Great product, great service, reasonable price. I've worn the Ringcon for a year. Just upgraded.

Title: The new RingConn 2 is phenomenal!
Content: The new RingConn 2 is phenomenal! It still looks new on my finger because the gold finish is holding up very nicely, and it is indeed lighter and not as bulky as the 1st edition. It also has improved diagnostics and really holds that charge! Truly a great product!

Title: great experience overall except for few…
Content:
great experience overall except for few things, ring is comfortable but the lack of mid-sizes with .5 increments is an issue. People genuinely between 8 and 9, for example, or 7 & 8, struggle with the sizing.
Price is really high for the apps limited offerings, and the sleep data is not accurate sometimes and needs a way to edit it in detail not all of it at once. That's a huge issue that affects overall trends in my opinion. Overall like the ring, battery is great, outside of it is matte which I love, but looks plastic to others lol. Most importantly - #1 reason I bought it, NO subscription, if that stays I keep using it. That's what helps this company overtake the main leading one in the industry.

Title: New gen 2 Ring is good
Content: New gen 2 Ring is good. Like it. The now Not Isabel gen 1 Ring isn*t really a good idea. From my Point of view this waste, which could have been avoided by allowing it to be used again. This is diappointing. I could have given it to Family or friend who is Interessed and does Not Like to spend the Money from beginning. May have Thai changed to gen 2 Ring as it is better.

Not happy with the upgrade. Kind of a bait & switch on the color choice. Why change?!?!
Everyday I look at the ring & wish I hadn’t upgraded. Little to no support from company. Will not recommend.

Title: Great customer service

Title: Great smart wellness tracker ring:
Content:
Great smart wellness tracker ring:
I have been using this ring for almost a year. The ring is a great fit on my finger. The app provides sufficient details without overhwhelm. The frequent upgrades in software have kept improving the functionality and information provided. The latest update even screens for sleep apnea.

Title: Awesome ring!
Content: This ring packs a powerful punch, so don’t let the size fool you. I bought a lot of smart rings to test a lot of them out and this one by far is the best in the market! First thing is I like that it’s thin because that makes a huge difference since some of them are just so thick, It’s uncomfortable to work with. Battery life is exactly what they State, it lasts just about two weeks or so. Other rings if they’re constantly running in the background like measuring heart rate or pulse ox. For example, it drains the battery like crazy but this ring does not. To me there’s no point of wearing a smart ring If it’s not going to constantly measure the details without dying so quick. The price of the ring to me is pretty fair considering what you’re expecting to work out of a good item. The saying you buy cheap you get cheap is exactly the case with all these smart rings. And the material they make this out of does not damage easily at all, which is another big plus for me if you are rough. The measurements are very accurate because I put it to the test; since I work in the medical field, it makes it a little bit easier to measure things. So overall, this is an excellent ring to keep track of things If you don’t always want to use your Apple Watch or any smart watch for that matter. I have used this for a few months now, so I can accurately measure If it lives up to the expectations.The only thing I hope that they add in the next software update would just be to measure blood pressure. Since all the other smart rings do that and for this one measuring everything under the sun, they just didn’t add blood pressure check. So I hope to see that shortly, but looking forward to the third generation whenever it comes out!

Title: I like all the options to see how many…
Content: I like all the options to see how many steps and how well i slept and all of the features this ring had, would be nice if there was an option to get the rings in half sizes also, I have a size 12 ring and is about a half size to big, probably could use a 11.5

Title: Overall a great product
Content:
Overall a great product, just some areas need to be tuned for customers. The graph for awake sleep time is not very easy to read, i was awake for 1hr through around 730, up and about before going back to sleep and it was not clear from the app. Maybe it has a hard time of identifying?

a prompt to ask would be great to confirm if i was awake.

Title: Disappointed... lack of support & service
Content:
I’m quite disappointed with the service. I ordered the RingConn Gen 2, but instead of the correct sizing kit, your team sent me the Gen 1 sizing kit. When I tried to resolve this through your support team, they took days to respond. When they finally did, they instructed me to place an order using the Gen 1 sizing kit.
Following their advice, I ordered a size 12, but it feels a size larger. If I had been provided the correct Gen 2 sizing kit, I might have chosen a size 11 instead, as the thinner design of Gen 2 offers less resistance.
To make matters worse, the package was supposed to include the ring protector, but it wasn’t included. After reaching out again, I received the wrong size protector (M instead of L for a size 12 ring). At this point, I didn’t even bother contacting support again—I’m simply too exhausted and frustrated by the repeated mistakes and lack of accountability.

Title: My ring
Content: Much better than an Apple Watch.

Nice looking, light weight and accurate information from this ring. I don’t care for wearing watches so this was a perfect alternative.
The only negative is the advertised 10 day battery life is more like 5-6 days…but still way better than my old smart watch which had less than a day life.
Overall I am very satisfied!

Content: I wasn't sure if I should replace my old Ringconn with version 2. I did it anyway, and it was a good decision. The first ring felt a bit bulky and not too comfortable. Version 2 is almost perfect!

Title: Comfortable, Easy, Great
Content:
I’ve been using Ringconn for almost a month now and I’m really impressed with it. I wear it everyday and only take it off to shower but you can keep it on. The app being free and extremely detailed was a big plus when I bought the ring. The ring is comfortable on any finger and I got used to it in 3 days. I would 100% recommend using the sizing guide as the rings run smaller than standard ring sizes.

Overall, it’s a great purchase and worth the money. I especially love the sleep function and all the information provided about how long I slept, my temperature, oxygen levels, and even sleep abnormalities.

Title: Great product
Content: Great product excellent customer support

Title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT AND HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
Content:
I bought the 1st generation ring. I have only had it 14 months and the battery is lasting less than a day. I have reset it and tried the other "fixes" their unhelpful customer service gave to no avail. And by the way, it takes 2-3 days to get a response from customer service even on an issue they are working. They finally offered me a $90 discount off a a new ring which is just ridiculous. 14 months and it is malfunctioning!!! And
I have seen so many reviews where there are technical or other problems with the ring and the company won't remedy. I DO NOT recommend. Try UltraHuman or Oura. I am trying one of those since I have read that their customer service is so much better.

Title: Gen 2 is easy to wear
Content: Gen 2 is easy to wear. Gives good results. Software updates come frequently.

Title: Nice Gizmo
Content:
Purchase and shipping were cozy. The ring measures can be used for all rings. Gen 2 is recognizable thinner and more comfy to wear. App is easy to handle and regularly updated and thankfully for free.
I am not sure if sleep supervision did lose a bit compared to Gen 1. Sleepapnoe I do not see as a reliable supervision with a mere ring.
Again, this is a gadget, not a medical device.
I like it ntl and it can surely provide a rough overview of what you go through through the day so you are enabled to move more or take yourself back a bit for relaxation.

Title: Satisfied and happy
Content: I‘m overall very happy about waering and using RingConn, even that way, that I bought RingConn Gen2.

Title: Very impressed with the ring 2 so many…
Content: Very impressed with the ring 2 so many details you get on the app ,

Title: You forget it is even there
Content: I’ve been using smartwatches for over nine years. While I appreciated the fitness metrics and health data they offered, I didn’t like not being able to wear a stylish automatic watch. Plus, the constant notifications on my wrist became an unnecessary distraction. RingConn has resolved these issues for me, and I’m thrilled with the experience so far. The standout features are the excellent fit and finish, the comprehensive fitness and health data, and the app’s intuitive presentation. Highly recommended!

Title: battery life is excellent!
Content:
My most concern was battery life which is excellent result.
All function are working fine. I thought it’s better to monitor body temperature also especially for COVID, Flu, etc.

Customer service has been very easy to work with and facilitate my move from a Gen 1 to a G2. They are open to customer feedback and I feel they are committed to making their product outstanding and their customers very satisfied. Great job!

Tom Sullivan
Juneau, Alaska

Also since steps are counted with the swing of your arm, when you are carrying things you get almost no steps recorded. It is really great that it doesn't require any paid subscriptions!

Content: Everything works great on this ring. The information is very useful and informative. The only thing that would be better for me is if it had blood pressure readings. Very happy so far 2 days in.

Title: Buyer beware
Content: Buyer beware: I think the tech side of this ring is great, however, if you have an issue best of luck to you. My ring size was different than the sizing kit resulting in the need for an exchange. The reply I received? "Sorry, demand is too high for us to help you." And, the 14 day "return policy" is NO returns - and IF the package was damaged before you received it the company MAY chose to help you. This is no "14 day return"policy. Again- cool product IF all the stars align for you. Anybody want to swap a Gen 2 size 11 or 13 for a 10?

Content: Time to receive sizing kit and then actual ring was far too long. No half-sizes available for better fit. Have not been impressed with data accuracy. Fitness data seems to be way under actual stats, compared to my Fitbit Versa. Very limited return policy. I regret buying this product.

Title: Love this ring
Content: I tried another popular ring and was disappointed with the sleep monitoring, especially the SPO2 levels all night was subpar, plus I had to pay monthly for your data. With RingConn I was able to see my oxygen levels all night long. I got the second-generation ring and the battery life was off the chart, lasts 12 days before I have to recharge. The ring was so thin and light.

If RingConn tweaks their measurements they will surpass Number 1 in popularity. I really like this ring over the others and i have tried and own them.

I 💕 love your ring(the old one) but I am not happy with your return policy. I would be happy if I could get a larger size in black or send it back for a refund. I would be glad to pay any additional cost. Thanks for giving me a chance to air my frustration. Joyce

Content: When I first started exercising with it, RingConn 2 was unable to accurately track my active heartrate. Since the latest firmware update, it is working much better.

Title: Still in learning phase
Content: Still having difficulty translating the data received. I am 77 years old, so that is expected :-). But, what I can ascertain, the information is quite helpful so far. I look forward to learning more and improving my health.

Title: The app needs improvements
Content: The app doesn’t link with apps like strava and would like to see my weight linked also through a scale app

Title: Perfect ring for simplicity
Content: Perfect ring for those who are looking for the necessities like step tracking, sleep/ sleep apnea monitoring, heart rate, fitness and etc. The app also continues to upgrade and add more items like AI tracking and etc. And with all of that the app does not require a membership. The ring is super light and sleek. I don't even notice that I have it on most times especially when sleeping. I'm really happy that I chose this ring among all the other rings on the market.

Title: Nice ring!!!
Content: Date of experience: November 26, 2024

Title: Great quality and monitoring
Content: The.ordering process was super easy and very impressed with the ring quality, battery life and vitals it measures (specially sleep).

Title: Love the ring. App WAS perfect.
Content: Love the ring. Do not love the new app. Old app was MUCH simpler and faster to read data. Now, the app includes unnecessary additions that complicate the user experience somewhat. Not bad, just not as clean and simple. Again, the ring is fantastic. Please go back to old app without the colorful hearts. The data is the product. And it’s a great product.

Title: I love the ring
Content: I love the ring, the fact that it reads everything I need. Especially tracking the blood oxygen saturation. I wish the app was better by having more exercise options since I do weight training, swimming, indoor cycling and elliptical, which should be common. I'm also trying to figure out how to collaborate the Apple Health with this. I appreciate all of it, though. Thank you.

Title: RingConn (gen 2) far exceeded my…
Content: RingConn (gen 2) far exceeded my expectations! I’m glad I gave it a try after being an Oura subscriber for many years. I love the fact that it doesn’t have a monthly subscription and it gives super useful data. I will be ordering the other colors so I can change up from time to time.

Title: Great service
Content: Great service. Provided regular status updates and order delivered as promised

Title: Good product but bad app
Content: Good product but bad app. They had a beta you could sign up for but switched to productionizing it without user input. I feel like I was sold on one app but was forced on another within a month.

Content:
It gives bad activity data. Tried to return no help there. They said talk to tech support. Reached out to tech support and they said its supposed to do that. What the hell
Don’t buy it.
Worthless

Title: Excellent ring choice
Content: The free app is great in helping keep track of my vitals and activities. The battery life is good not charging having to charge every few days.

Title: I absolutely love this ring
Content: I absolutely love this ring, it fits perfectly and works very well. My one complaint is the customer service is a bit slow to respond, but I don’t need customer service now that I have received the ring.

Title: Terrible
Content:
Terrible, they do not respect what is reported on their site for a possible return, they only find excuses.
First and last time I buy from them.

Title: Impressive
Content: Good service, the ring arrived quickly. It does everything my fitness watch does except altitude and phone/text notifications. I'm quite impressed by how well it works.

Title: The ring gives a lot great health…
Content: The ring gives a lot great health information throughout the day, and the sleep apnea monitoring excellent. However, my main form of exercise is swimming, but the ring only detects walking, running, and cycling activities. I would like to see the developers add a swimming activity detection in a future update.

Title: Great quality

Title: I am really dissappointed with the…
Content: I am really dissappointed with the accuracy of tracking the steps. Also the Display of active calories is very strange or way too high. I had to switch back to my Smartwatch for better measurement. The sleep Analysis is not bad though.

Title: Great product
Content: Very light and easy to wear

Title: Great data, good hardware, awful UI.
Content:
The hardware seems to work as expected and I had no problems with delivery. The battery life is insanely good. The ring is very slim and comfortable. The weak point is the paint (matte black). It is already starting to scuff after only a week. I was hoping it was more robust. I also wish they had a size 15 ring. The 14 does not fit my index or middle fingers. The recent UI update is atrocious.

I originally chose RingConn because it was efficient at showing simple raw data. I was willing to put up with a beta interface assuming it would become more professional and exceed competitors.

The recent UI update is inefficient with the data, and the beta AI w/emojis, smiley faces, and colorful flowers doesn’t match the rings original audience. The AI literally just tells you what you see if you saw the data charts. The UI change feels like a bait and switch from the original portrayal of the app software.

Besides being silly looking, If someone has blurry vision or color blindness, the butt-leaf clover is very difficult to work with compared to the previous diamond. It looks blurry, and is a downgrade in function.

Hopefully RingConn fixes it soon.

Title: Better than 1st
Content: I had the first ring which I liked, this one is thinner, pretty accurate I think, I like it better overall.

Title: Love my RingCon
Content: Love my RingCon, traded up to the 2.0 as soon as it came out. It even tracks my sleep apnea.

Title: Great ring
Content: Great ring! I can't wear it at work, big bummer.

Title: I eliminated mild sleep apnea
Content: It is great to have the knowledge to improve your health. I found that I had mild sleep apnea. It was easily eliminated completely by limiting myself to one glass of wine per night rather than several. I have had the ring nearly a month and I feel so much better and rested than I have in the past.

Title: The ring is basically a sleep tracker
Content:
The ring is good at tracking sleep apnea but falls short on accurate steps, accurate calorie count and no tracking for workout activity. Also does not pair or work well with other apps, like Garmin, or My Fitness Pal or Map My Run.
So basically, its a sleep tracker.

Title: My husband has contacted you with our…
Content: My husband has contacted you with our grievances. The ring is shiny which was not clear before we bought it and the protective covering pull and broke after one week. My husband has requested a replacement for both of us in black but we have yet to see and progress. Very disappointing.not sure about the date

Content:
Bad quality experience with the second generation ring. After only two days of use it was already scratched. I used the first model for a year without scratches only with obvious signs of the time.
Stored in its case and worn the Samsung Galaxy Ring. Bad story, too bad

When you eventually get replies from their customer service team, they are completely unhelpful. Then when the ring finally turns up, the size is wrong because they manufactured them too big. What a shambles. Save yourself the hassle and buy from another brand if you're after a smart ring.

It's quite comfortable and I don't always notice I had it on. I did consider Gen 2 and if I didn't have Gen 1 then I'd probably buy it. At the moment I'm holding off on that.

Title: Worst customer service of my life, terrible experience. Go with oura.
Content: I bought the ringconn ring, and tried to cancel it before it shipped. They told me it shipped and they couldn't cancel the order but would send a return label when it arrived. They never sent it, even after following up every few days for two weeks. Then they told me I needed to send photos of the ring to get a return label. Then I sent photos of the ring (that funny enough, doesn't charge so it doesn't turn on) as they asked, and they told me not to have opened the package. I seriously don't know what to do -- speechless of such a terrible customer service experience for a new startup company. Go with Oura, which my partner has, their customer service is great. RingConn is a con.

Title: Yay. You made your ring smaller
Content: You made your ring smaller. Before, it was the same size as everyone else’s. I’ve tried them all and like yours the best simply because it’s smaller so over time is more comfortable. I wish you would consider making it a little square. When i compared wedding rings, the square ones were more comfortable so that’s what i got. (Round rings sometimes hit the nerves against the two fingers on either side of the finger i have your ring on. Which hurts.)

Well, I chose the silver option and when the ring arrived it was a totally different color. I can't ID customer service to see what could be done and here is their response: "We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. The silver color for Gen 2 is actually a glossy finish. Due to the high demand for orders, we’re unable to arrange an exchange/return currently due to color issues.
Sorry for the inconvenience caused. However, we suggest trying the ring for a while longer to see if it may match your preference in daily usage."

Title: After 2 weeks of wearing the new Gen 2…
Content: After 2 weeks of wearing the new Gen 2 I can attest that it is not accurate. Steps are way off! It gave me the same step count for a very active day as a day I rode in a car for 7 hours and had virtually no exercise. I took a walk around the block and literally counted my steps and the ring gave 80-100 steps to every 20 steps I physically counted. The sleep tracker thinks I’m in light sleep when I’m awake and shows I’m awake when I’m sleeping. I don’t know if I got a defective one or not, but I don’t trust the accuracy of this at all.

Title: Inaccurate data
Content:
have had the “Smart Ring” RingConn for about 2 months.
My first impression is that the ring is well made and
seems to have some sophisticated technology.
Simply put the functions as indicated on the Ring main screen are sleep, Stress,
activity, and heart Rate. It provides a lot of data on each function.
Personally I find the data almost overwhelming and squeezed together.
What I have found, in my brief time, with the Ring is that under Activity, (Steps)
is that they are inaccurate. I have a pedometer and an apple watch and they both
record similar readings in steps taken. Also the ring does not provide distance for
the Steps. If you know how many steps you should know the approximate distance.
The RingConn is way off, on average 200-600 steps. This is unacceptable
and I would think “Skews” the data on other applications on the Ring.
The “Heart rate”(BPM) is also suspect during activity. No clear way to test except by my
Watch and that indicates a discrepancy.
I am disappointed that the Ring does not capture the most basis function of exercise(steps)
in an accurate manner and heart rate.
I did contact RingConn about the steps issue and got a response promptly but
the answer was sort of undefined and in no way an answer to solving the issue.
I have “reset” the Ring several times but that did not change the accuracy of the steps.
I will try it for a little while longer then I will have chalk this up to some devices are
not up to the task.
I would not buy this ring if you expect it to record the basic function of tracking your
Exercise (Steps) or even distance and perhaps heart rate during activity.

DM

Title: Perfect service and perfect quality
Content: Date of experience: August 28, 2024

Title: Service fine Product Bad
Content: Service was fine, but I cannot use your product without data making it useless to me. Why do I need to have a constant data connection to check my heart rate?

Title: Good gadget to track your sleep
Content:
The Ring looks pretty good (obv. not as good as a accessory ring). The Appdesign is good and easy to understand.
It monitors sleep, HR and SpO2 very well. The HRV can only be measured precisely if ur hand is not moving. Accordingly, i don't know how much you can put on the stress index which the ring calculates based on the HRV which can't be recorded accurately during the day with all the movement.
The ring also overestimates the amount of steps taken, which is shown by the difference in steps measured by my phone and by the ring.
Also be aware, that the ring of the sizing kit is (i can only talk about my order) a little smaller than the actual ring.

I bought the ring to monitor my sleep, which is tracked very good, but only 4 stars due to sizing kit not being acurate and the HRV measuring as well as the overestimation of the steps (which for me is not very relevant)

Title: Good and frequent communication
Content: Good and frequent communication. Quick response to support questions. Sizing kit is a classy touch. Just hoping my experience with the product is as good.

Title: Love this ring
Content: Love this ring. It’s magical. Especially like that they aren’t demanding money for an ongoing subscription - it just downloads to the free app which is very detailed and integrates with other data collection systems. The data encourages me to exercise more consistently so as to get a good daily score. I’ve been able to use the ring when swimming and waterskiing as it appears to have the best waterproofing in the industry. I’m a big fan!

Very limited workout tracking & no function to track nutrition intake. Overall I found the Fibit to be a much better option for my needs. I was very pleased with the customer service, I originally ordered the incorrect size and was able to ship it back for a size exchange (I had to pay to ship it). Content: The ring I have is incredibly glitchy. Every time I contact them about an issue the response is basically “let’s wait and see if it keeps happening”. A few examples of the glitches, I started an “outdoor walk” and it added 2 miles right off, after contacting them about the issue it now subtracts about 1/2 a mile. It tells me I’m asleep when I’m wide awake. Also the battery drains much faster than they claim it should.

Title: Never again!
Content:
As Backer #304, I completed my payment instantly and filled out the Pledgebox on September 20, 2024. Despite fulfilling my obligations promptly, the shipment was only initiated on October 1, 2024—10 days later. The product was supposed to arrive by the end of September at the latest. However, it was only after I filed a complaint that the shipment was even started, which is completely unacceptable.

This level of delay and lack of proactive communication is highly unprofessional. I had high hopes for this project, but based on my experience, I cannot recommend doing business with this company.

Title: Unclear and amateur communication
Content: Unclear and amateur communication, Can't handle a kickstarter project or the delivery of some thousand orders.

Title: Five stars for the Ring and the Customer Srervice

I purchased a Gen 1 ring from Marketplace approximately 8 months ago. I also own an Oura but I preferred my Ringconn. The app for Ringconn is more intuitive for me.

I was happy with my ringconn until the ring's battery life failed. I contacted Rinconn and they replaced the ring. My experience with customer service was fantastic. They asked questions and attempted to resolve the issue but ultimately replaced the ring once they determined that it had failed prematurely.

Five starts for Rigconn for their ring and their customer service.

Title: I had been wearing a 51mm Garmin Tactix…
Content:
I had been wearing a 51mm Garmin Tactix to sleep for tracking and it was a bulky annoyance. I bought the Ring to get the tracking without the large watch on my wrist.
The results have been very similar when I wear them both on hikes and to sleep, which is impressive.
My only disappointment is I bought this and 1 month later, the Ring 2 was announced and it has much better battery life. I would have liked to see a Trade-In offer.

Title: RingConn Rocks!
Content: Excellent product, great customer service.

Title: The ring is very stylish and comfortable!
Content:
The ring is very stylish and comfortable to wear and gives some great insights into my main interests of concern ie sleep, heart rate, and O2 levels.

One discrepancy I'm finding is the ring is struggling to differentiate between me sitting in my chair quietly watching television and me being asleep in my bed.

For this reason, I have stopped wearing my ring 24 hours per day to get a more accurate picture of my sleep hours.

My only other wish would be that there could also be a web-based app rather than just a phone app.

Given the average age of the user probably points towards the older end of the scale, it would simply make it easier for my generation to be able to expand their readings and drill down more into their results to get a better understanding of them.

Title: During sporting activities
Content: During sporting activities, the pulse is not measured correctly. My heart rate belt shows a maximum heart rate of 165, the ring only shows a maximum of 110. That's a big difference. This means that the daily evaluation is incorrect.

Title: I'm very satisfied with the Ring
Content: I'm very satisfied with the Ring. I enjoy the sleep, steps, stress, calories evaluation that it gives me daily. I'm glad that they added the steps exercise since it wasn't their before. I would like weights added to it as well. I know that they are working on it. I had the Fitbit and was not satisfied with it.

Title: Love the ring
Content: Love the ring

Title: a great experience
Content: my transaction was fast and secure and received my ring quickly, and have loved every minute of owning it

Title: Great Ring.
Content:
Great Ring.
I see all the relevant things what I need.

Title: Bad data, even worse customer service.
Content:
I purchased a RingConn in the spring and was deeply disappointed in my experience. I was promised accurate data, and it could not be more off. I was up with a sick child all night and my sleep score was "excellent" even though I barely slept. I tried to return it the first week I got it, but RingConn never responded to my email and deleted my Instagram comments. I also ordered a ring protector from them the day it arrived and realized after 3 weeks it never even shipped.

I tried appealing it with my CC company, but was recently rejected for the ring, however received a refund (from the CC company) for the ring protector.

RingConn is serious about their return policy which shows me they know they have an inferior product that they do not stand behind. I highly recommend NOT purchasing this product and going with one of the better competitors!

I recently purchased an OuraRing instead and am loving the accurate data provided!

Title: Great product and easy to use app
Content: The ordering and shipping process was easy and quick considering the sizer had to be shipped first to determine the correct size. I highly recommend wearing the sizing rings for a couple of days to determine the correct size and finger the RingConn will be worn on. I think the ring works great and the app is easy to use. The only thing I would change is a visual way to determine if the ring is in the correct position.

Title: So far I'm impressed with this ring.
Content:
So far I'm impressed with this ring.
all the functions are great, ring size I ordered a 7 should ordered an 8 so have ordered another in an 8 & may give the 7 to my daughter when the other arrives.
Update: Received the size 8 not much difference to the size 7, so still can't wear it on the finger I want to. The measuring for the right size is very problematic you think it would be simple, apparently not... Now I have to pay $15 to get a ring sizing kit to go through the whole process again to return the 2nd one without a guarantee I'm going to get the right size.

Title: It was nice that they gave us a free…
Content: It was nice that they gave us a free sizing kit

Title: Delivery on time and product perfect…
Content: Delivery on time and product perfect till now.

Title: Price-performance is top
Content: Price is really ok, the app is very good, I love it

Title: Response was very fast and on point
Content: Response was very fast and on point. I would recommend without reservation!

Title: Tracking sleep is pretty accurate
Content: Tracking sleep is pretty accurate. But others like steps n heart rate during exercise not so. Another bad thing is the ring have to be very close to your handphone to sync. Other than that it’s great overall

Title: One month in…
Content: So far, the ring has done everything that I hoped for, and I am very happy with it. The app is easy to use and the ring looks good too.

Title: Able to watch my oxygen levels during…
Content: Able to watch my oxygen levels during sleep also body temperature.

Title: The most is okay
Content: The most is okay. But we need more arts of activity modes (biking indoor, e-biking outdoor ...)

Title: Great Product - Great customer service….I ordered the…
Content:
Great customer service….I ordered the wrong size ring, and once I realized that, I emailed customer service to ask if my order could be changed. I received word back shortly afterward from a customer service rep who let me know that she would take care of making no the change for me.
I love the ring. It is stylish and very comfortable to wear. I like having all of the different data reports daily. The ring charges quickly and keeps the charge for days. I am happy that I made this purchase!

Title: Excellent
Content: Excellent ring. It works really well.

Title: Very happy with my ring!!
Content: From the start of my journey after choosing RingConn it has been nothing but great. From the very beginning the customer service has been great. I’ve had my ring a week and love it. It has given me what I was looking for and am very happy with my purchase!

Title: Been wearing ring for about two weeks
Content: Been wearing ring for about two weeks. It has been an eye opener on health status. Enjoy the accuracy of steps taken seems to be more precise than my Apple Watch that I use religiously.

Title: Quick to respond
Content: Quick to respond, helpful. Felt a little scammy at first, but I think it's just because the assistance is outsourced from other countries where English isn't the first language. Helpful and relatively quick return when I ended up getting a size 6 ring instead of a sizing kit. Kind of annoying to have to pay the return fee of $15 and you go through paypal...kind of weird but it turned out okay.

Title: I was recommended Ring(type) health from my Chiropractor
Content:
I was recommended a Ring(type) health device from my chiropracticor. She has the Oura Ring and has consistently showed me her data and differences when we compare. I prefer the RingConn because of the value, fit, and also I appreciate the data. I think the data, user face, and the notifications can be improved. It is a tad bit cumbersome to navigate and the data while interesting isn't as informative with suggestions, ideas to progress/improve and variable options/suggestions of "how" to improve and why. While I fully understand this is not necessarily a health product that supplements professional advice etc. I think the RingConn does have room for improvement in this area. Particularly for those of various levels of fitness, age, and interest in health (whether light go-with-the flow or aggressively trying to improve their health). Overall, the look, fit, and battery-life etc is wonderful.

Context of the reviewer (me), I am 34 years old. Moderately active (played sports most my life, generally relatively weekly active with hikes, walks, sports, etc about 2/wk or more.

Looking forward to more future improvements, thanks for an awesome product!

Title: Customer service was very quick to…
Content: Customer service was very quick to answer my questions and concerns. This made me feel very good about my purchase.

Title: So many features to this ring
Content: So many features to this ring -- still learning though. Thrilled I'm able to get apneas from my ring to my iphone -- will be comparing my data in two weeks.

Title: Completely satisfied
Content:
Completely satisfied!
Good and fast support, fast delivery to germany, high-quality product including packaging.
Very satisfied after a month of use.

Title: Returned and no refund
Content: I returned the ring because it didn’t track what I wanted it to track. Hardly any exercises. I returned the ring and it was delivered back to Ringconn July 3rd. It’s July 16th and I still don’t have my refund.

Title: Ring stopped charging. 14-day return policy
Content:
Ring stopped charging and i haven't even had it a month and the return time is only 14 days. If this was such an amazing product why the short return time? That doesn't say confidence.
Also, the instructions and app are easy to understand. i never did figure out how to let it know that playing tennis is not just steps but exercise. along w/ other not-walking exercise which isn't counted.

Title: OURA convert
Content: I had an OURA that finally died. I didn’t want a ring with a subscription plan so I researched and chose RingConn. I’m LOVING 💖 my ring. Great customer service. Easy to read stats. Nice job.

Title: Great customer service
Content:
Great customer service, initially got the gold ring, but the colour was way off from the sample.
Contacted support and immediately offered a couple options to resolve.

Shipping to North America was a bit slow, so have patience.

Title: I contacted support regarding the delay…
Content: I contacted support regarding the delay of my order and I must say they behaved very well. Fast and always on the ball. I have been testing the RingConn for 3 days now and I am getting on well. It would be nice if they also added sleep apnoea detection to the app.

Title: This ring is easy to set up and use
Content: This ring is easy to set up and use. After using the Oura ring for a while I’m happy with the data available and no subscription.

Title: Great love it for the sleeping part
Content: Great love it for the sleeping part. I have sleep apnea and works great if I nap without CPAP telling me how low my oxygen goes.

Title: Ring looks/feels good, accuracy suspect
Content:
I like the look of the ring. However, the sleep monitoring does not seem to be accurate in terms of when I’m awake and not awake. The other night I laid awake for over an hour but that time was tracked as asleep.

Also, I do high intensity work out classes and it doesn’t seem to recognize those sessions other than an elevated heart rate.

The Activity choices leave a lot to be desired as well. I know they are in Beta testing so I’m hoping that will improve soon.

Title: The ring fails to record the first…
Content: The ring fails to record the first three hours of my sleep.

Title: Support offered.
Content: Support offered.

Title: Well fitting, comfortable smart ring
Content: Great, well fitting , lightweight ring. Wonderful customer service.

Title: I have mixed feelings
Content: I have mixed feelings - I love the ring metrics. I feel like they’re pretty accurate. It’s not noticeable to me, the charging case is super convenient, overall it’s good. But two days in, and I’ve already scratched it. Now, it’s been closer to a week and i have multiple scratches. Additionally, i ordered the ring sizing kit, and i wore several rings over the course of a couple days - i picked a size, but i feel like it slides on and off way easier than the sizer, so i would size down if you’re in between.

Title: Wonderful customer service
Content: Wonderful customer service

Title: Buy it!
Content: RingConn gives great insight for overall health. I had the Apple watch but didn’t like how you have to select or “start” your workout. Plus didn’t like being tied to my phone 24/7. RingConn brings simplicity but gives facts with no effort

Content:
I would like to have the possibility to add manually information about weight, blood pressure, info like headache and to see on diagrams.
Then the ring should make Ecg and to cakculate the balance of fat, musclesand water on the body.

Content: I am very pleased with my ring. It is giving me valuable information. Just remember to have it sized to your pointer finger. Love it.

Content: So much easier to wear than a fitbit, watch, etc... Great info., excellent sleep tracking, step counting is accurate, really useful graphs - all around great ring. I love the no subscription fee. Can't wait for 2nd. generation to be released. Keep doing what you're doing.

Content:
Love everything about this ring. Easy to set up , comfortable to wear.
Wish it had glucose readings.

Title: Great, but steps are off
Content: I like this ring. Only paying a flat price is a HUGE pro. I use it for fitness and sleep tracking, in addition to my apple watch. The only cons is that it is off with my excercise minutes and steps. By a LOT. If I walk 11k steps it will think I only walked 9k. It doesn't always do this, maybe once every 2 weeks. But I think it needs better bluetooth or syncing drivers to avoid this issue in the future.

Title: Worked for 7 months . . .
Content: I had the Oura before then when it died I got a RingConn. It was comparable but 7 months in it has died giving a "PPG sensor error." I contacted support 2 days ago and so far have not received a response.

Title: Minor issues, overall satisfied
Content: Overall, I think the ring is great. Getting the sizing kit was crucial and my ring got to me quickly. The app is really easy to navigate and I am impressed by the accuracy of a lot of the readings. My biggest criticism is that my ring was counting steps as I’m driving. A one hour car ride got me approximately 1400 steps so I cannot wear the ring when commuting. Otherwise, it’s great and I would recommend.

Content: Date of experience: June 10, 2024

Title: What a good surprise!
Content:
Very good device. Easy to manage and comfortable to wear.
With the option to receive first the ring measure kit you couldn’t miss your right size. I toke almost one week before decide which size is the right one for me. I would wear the sample during my day’s activity to be sure it doesn’t get me uncomfortable and stressed.
I’m not sure about the reliable of the steps count, but I think they will improve the software time by time.
The external surface is well finished end seems enough scratch resistant for daily normal use.
You can wear without mind in your bath activities as it’s water resistant and neutral soap safe.
What to say to close this review, the device is well done, well finished and well designed.
Well well well, thanks ringconn.
Cheers, Francesco.

Title: Sizing process was perfect
Content: Sizing process was perfect. Ring arrived promptly and was easy to set up.

Title: Great non-subscription smart ring

Title: Accurate with long battery life provides day to day consistency
Content: Pretty accurate. the long battery life enables me to track sleep status without taking it off to recharge. This provides a more consistent day to day tracking of vital signs and activity. It would be terrific if you could somehow provide blood pressure readings as well. All in all, very pleased with my purchase.

The reason of my 4 stars, is maybe I don't understand the full mechanic detection method of the Ring like HRV and so on, but as I'm almost past out watching The Big Bang on the tube, my anxiety goes up to 83, which makes no sense to me, since the day it ranges about 40. :)

Title: The ring good, App needs to be improved
Content: The ring itself is great and records the data properly, but the app needs to be improved. For example, the manually activated sports activities do not include training in enclosed buildings. This applies, for example, to fitness/machine training and also to ergometers and cross trainers. The ring's measurement and recording of pulse, calorie consumption, etc. also only works inadequately and inaccurately in these cases.
