Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: Great ring. I wish it tracked exercise
Content:
I love what this ring tells me about my health and sleep. And I like the trending it does with the data.
I wish it tracked exercise. I'm having a hard time getting it to recognize when I'm doing cardio. It does not read my heart beat when it rises above 100 during exercise.

Title: Easy to use, great customer service
Content: Ordering and using this product has been fantastic. I didn't know what size to order so a sizing kit was immediately shipped and I received it within a few days. I decided to order the size that fit on both my index finger AND middle finger (at least that was the plan). There was some confusion about which email I should order under, but I called customer service and they got me fixed up right away. Once I got the ring, it was slightly larger than the sizing sample and only fits snugly in my index finger, but that's ok. I love the information the ring provides and the app is easy to use. I'm fully satisfied.

Title: I'm ready for my next stroke, Mr DeMille.
Content: I have no idea what half of my stats mean and I'm not even sure how accurate this ring is...but I had a stroke last summer and my Apple Watch registered something but I can't get enough info. I wish I had the RingConn back then, it might have told me more. I'm ready for my next stroke, I'll tell you then how good this ring is. I walked away no damage, I was lucky. Hope I never find out how good this ring is. Ha,ha.

Title: Overall Rinconn is a "good" value
Content: Overall Rinconn is a "good" value. The fit is not good or comfortable. The app contains a great deal of good information but is organized poorly. I purchased a protective cover for the ring that was garbage ... three cheaply made rubber covers that made the ring more uncomfortable and much less attractive. I think this company needs to pay attention to customer personas. They need to understand better the expectations of active people and good field testing will improve the product.

Title: No negatives here!
Content: Got ring size kit quickly.. ring came fairly quick. No issues and have had several months. Belong to Facebook group and all questions are answered quick and correctly. No negatives here!!!

Title: Item to big and only allows two weeks…
Content: Item to big and only allows two weeks to return

Title: Best smart ring I’ve used so far
Content: After using other smart rings, I found RingConn to be the most comfortable, best design, superbly accurate, information rich smart device.

Title: Perfect for what I was looking for.
Content: Date of experience: March 01, 2024

Title: Once I got the ring
Content: Once I got the ring, took way to long to receive it, it works great and have no complaints.

Title: I so far think possibly better than the…
Content: I so far think possibly better than the Oura

Title: My ring does not fit and when I emailed…
Content: My ring does not fit and when I emailed about it I was told that I couldn’t exchange it for the correct size.

Title: RingConn is great
Content:
RingConn is great. 2 things to improve the rings: 1. For rings to come in 1/2 sizes. 2. A mark on the ring showing the “bottom” of the ring.

Thanks.

Title: The Ring does everything I wanted to…
Content: The Ring does everything I wanted to do. It measures my sleep, my stress, my heart rate, and my well-being. Thank you so much.I’m

Title: Do your research to find the best ring for you. This one is a winner for me!
Content: I did a lot of research in finding the smart ring that would work best for me. I decided on the RingConn ring because of the style, color choices and information the RingConn app would provide me. I also didn't want to pay for a subscription service just to use the ring. Before ordering the ring, I was sent a ring size kit. The kit is amazing. It provides enough physical ring sizes to meet everyone's needs. Try one on for 24 hrs and see what fits best before ordering. The ring does exactly what RingConn says it does and does not do. I take a shower with it, sleep with it, along with exercise. The app information has helped me with several changes in my life. From my sleep habits to exercise. I have had the ring about a month now and couldn't have chosen a better smart ring that is currently on the market.

Title: Love that this ring keeps its charge…
Content: Love that this ring keeps its charge for the entire 6-7 days as promised. The travel charger is excellent, and the app itself is easy to use and I like that it shows the date continuously unlike the Oura ring that I switched from. Excellent product, happy with my purchase.

Title: Inaccurate data.It assumes I’m asleep…
Content: Inaccurate data.It assumes I’m asleep when I’m not. Doesn’t account to any physical activity except for walking.

Title: Works well
Content: Works well. Good price.

Title: Good data - hopefully more to come ...
Content: The ring sensors and the app provide interesting and useful information about my sleep cycles, blood oxygen, activity, etc. As the product evolves, I look forward to additional types of data from the ring.

Title: Sleep tracking is suboptimal
Content: The sleep tracking is not very accurate. It allowed me to check some hypothesis and form new ones, such as whether I had sleep apnea, whether sleeping on the side was better for me. But as the timings are off by sometime more than an hour, it's hard to use it to track the effect of small changes.

Title: I love this health tracker
Content:
I love this health tracker! I didn’t want a smart watch, as I have a very nice analog one already, so this was the perfect solution.
I was a bit apprehensive about the quality ( as it was the less expensive version of the ones on the market) but I’m more than impressed with the accuracy, quality and ease of use.

I would say the delivery times could use some improvement, it took almost 4 weeks to receive the Ring sizing kit, had another week to receive the actual Ring itself. I also wish they had a polished version, I have the silver one, and it looks quite dull compared to my other jewellery, however that’s quite an petty observation, given the functionality of the unit.

I love the sleep tracking, it’s really helped me to actively improve the quality of my sleep. I’ve noticed a direct correlation between the number of steps I get each day and the quality of my sleep and HRV.
Absolutely recommend this health tracker to anyone who is looking for a deeper insight on how to improve their overall health .

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

The RingConn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has! I highly suggest this ring since there’s no monthly fee & the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the aSee more

Love the idea of the ring. Somethings to note. It gets scratched very easily and I'm not expecting it to look great a year from now. Also there are no postpartum or pregnancy setting for the fertilitySee more
Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: basic
Content: It does the basic, nothing more nothing less.

Title: The ring works and looks great
Content: The ring works and looks great. The battery life is good too, as we only have to charge it once a week. Very happy with it overall!

Title: So Far So Good
Content:
Delivery of the ring was quick considering the distance it had to travel. Everything is as described.
I am a little concerned that some reading differ greatly from other measuring devices. Will need to see how this plays out.
Customer service was great. I had occasion to email them and was emailed with a resolution within 48 hours.

Title: Exceed expectations
Content: Great purchase experience & the ring itself has exceeded my expectations. I feel arm with great stats to help me manage my health.

Title: Health Insights
Content: I'm getting great new insights into how to improve my overall health. Comparing the app's graphical recordings with my actual feelings and experience is helping me understand my body better. I am getting a lot more exercise as I see the benefits.

Title: Bye Bye I-Watch and Hello Ring!
Content: Love the ring! Once a week charge and you can monitor so much from it! I’ve purchased 6 so far for gifts!

Title: Fashion and function
Content: Arrived quickly, packaging is beautiful and battery life is amazing. Looks just like a trendy ring.

Title: Best smart ring available at the…
Content: Best smart ring available at the moment. Even the App is now translated into German.

Title: Very good ring
Content: It more was what expect very easy to read and to understand

Title: RingConn works very well and charges…
Content: RingConn works very well and charges fast. Great value. No issues with syncing with the app!

Title: My RingConn is amazing!!
Content: The RingConn is so much better than my watch was. I am finally getting the type of statistics that matter to me. I bought this because I wanted to know how I was really sleeping but gives me so much more than I hoped it would. Also loving the battery life! I have and will continue to recommend RingConn!

Title: The only smart device worth wearing
Content: The level of health information this device gives is beyond any other smart device I've had. I would highly recommend it. No more charging daily, it lasts 7 days, very fast charging, gives great tips, insights into your sleep patterns and how to improve them. Its a 5 star review from me for sure.

Title: Very responsive and had correct…
Content: Very responsive and had correct information about my delivery.

Title: Great Monitor of Sleep and Stress
Content: I love the ring design. The ability to try different sizes was extremely helpful to determine the correct ring size for my finger. A rose gold option would be amazing. The main reason for purchase was to track my sleep and stress level. The recommendations to improve REM and Deep Sleep is extremely helpful. For stress, it is helpful to see the levels throughout the day. This allows me to reflect on what I was doing at that time in order to reduce or avoid the same triggers later. Overall, wearing a ring is so much better than wearing a watch. I LOVE IT!

Title: Never received ordered accessory
Content: Date of experience: April 05, 2024

Title: Ring works as advertised& is…
Content: Ring works as advertised& is comfortable , having a logo or some kind of marking to know when the sensors are not in the right position would B helpful. Otherwise I am pleased with it

Title: Ring doesn't quite have the resolution…
Content:
Ring doesn't quite have the resolution I expected on some of the tracking features and is missing on temperature and some of the tracking capabilities.
I understand the product is still developing.
Tradeoff with other brands are the lower purchase point and no monthly fee versus an unfinished product.

Title: The rind does not synch up with Apple…
Content:
The rind does not synch up with Apple Health!!

It is otherwise a nice ring with a good fit and appearance.

Title: After a bad year of stress and heath…
Content: After a bad year of stress and heath issues the ring has helped me to pin point times of stress with what was happening at that time ,then im able to reduce the triggets are for me .

Title: Good passive solution
Content:
I am satisfied with the design, the application and the "passive" logic of use. Smart bracelets always annoyed me when they alert me to something, they always want some kind of interaction, the ring is a really great solution in this perspective. Plus I can wear a normal classic analog watch. The ring has a very good battery life and the charging solution is elegant.
I give four stars because the application still needs to develop some functionalities, for example different types of exercises. And you need to realize that the number of measured steps is always a little overestimated (it's logical, every person waves his hand all the time, not only while walking)

Title: RingConn in my opinion is better than Oura for sleep data
Content: My original ring wouldn't charge - -I bought a new charger and then still not charging - BUT I bought a new ring in silver. It works awesome - and I have the other ring that came to life...but I don't wear it any more - sort of a back up. RingConn seems to catch my deep sleep better than OURA (I wear both rings at same time on different hand).

Title: Great product at a good price and no ongoing fees!
Content: Great price, no ongoing fees to rip you off and great mobile app s/w, a great combination of features to compete with other smart rings

Title: A smart sleep monitor
Content: This ring has been useful in tracking my vital health indicators. It has helped me establish a sensible sleep pattern that has resulted in feeling better. I also use the heart rate feedback when I am exercising. I would highly recommend this ring for getting control of your health.

Title: An excellent device
Content: An excellent device! With no monthly subscription

Title: Enjoying my RingConn
Content: Great product as a companion to my Apple Watch. Seems to be very similar in the key metrics of HR, SP02, sleep, etc. Excited to see the addition of workout tracking.

Title: Difficult for big hands
Content: The ring is somewhat uncomfortable to wire especially when grasping door nobs etc. While ringconn has the best selection of sizes large hands are left out just like the competition. This was the only manufacturer whose ring would fit my right hand ring finger vice index finger which would have more comfortable to wear. I like the battery lasting seven days mostly. Charging is very easy and fast. It would be handy to have a visible way to know the ring is in right position when worn. I currently use a dab of finger nail polish so I can quickly verify the rings position. The price of the ring is fair. To be fair I recognize the problem with manufacturing for other than the most popular sizes.

Title: A well designed product
Content: The product they built works really well. i used a competitors offering prior to ringconn but ringconn works better, fits me well and is much lighter. I am very happy with the fact that i no longer have to pay a subscription. a solid company

Title: RingConn Has Given Me a Less Distracted Life
Content: I have loved everything about my RingConn. It's comfortable, and the app gives me every bit of information I need. I love the sleep review each morning, and I've tried different apps to collect similar information. I have loved not having a smartwatch, that seemed to really distract me. I am much more present in my life, which seems funny to say, but for me it's been a huge win. Long charge, easy to charge.

Title: Perfect Everyday Device
Content: The ring and accompanying app give great information on my sleep, stress levels, and activity intensity. The app provides the right amount of details and the charts are great at presenting the information in a useful format. I also have a Fitbit Charge 5 and a Garmin Venu 3 and I find the RingConn the best in these categories. Small and unassuming - doesn't get in the way. Runs many days without requiring a charge, and the small charge case is perfect because it doesn't require you to plug into a wall outlet all the time (I have had the ring since February and have yet to recharge the charge case). Would highly recommend this product for those interested in understanding how their body is behaving.

Title: Great interface
Content: Good value.

Title: Better than a Galaxy Watch 6. Lol
Content: I love this ring. It works great. The amount of information it can provide is crazy. I'll never understand how something so small can store so much data and be capable of transferring that data to the app. Everything works perfectly. I've had zero complaints. I like that there's no monthly fee. I highly recommend Ring Conn. I have nothing bad to say about it at all. In fact I had a Galaxy Watch 6 and had lots of issues with it not storing or syncing data. This ring has been flawless and I've owned it for like 3 or 4 months now. Get one. You'll love it.

Title: Don’t have it yet after a month
Content: Can’t rate my experience as, after almost a month since ordering, my ring has not yet shipped a month after ordering. I Have only received a single communication from customer service, and that was after I inquired on the status and that was only to confirm that they had received my order. I can understand if the delay is due to supply issues, but it’s not mentioned on the website, and has bot been communicated to those waiting for their order.

Title: I enjoy using this ring
Content: I enjoy using this ring; however, the only thing I would suggest is making it easier to know which side is up or down. During the day as my fingers swell or shrink the ring turns and I can't determine sometimes where the sensors are. I've gone so far as placing a small sticker on the "top" of the ring to know it's always in the right position. Otherwise, love the ring and love the "free subscription" app with all the detailed information.

Title: Fantastic!
Content:
I am thrilled with my RingConn. It is exactly what I wanted to complement my Apple Watch.
Great battery life
Reliable data
Comfortable to wear
Robust and attractive appearance
No subscription
10/10!

Title: Excellent Data Analysis
Content: I have enjoyed my ring for a few months before writing this review. I find the information available on the app excellent and helpful. It fulfills my need for complete sleep and health data. Very easy to understand and easy to use. I would recommend this ring for anyone wanting accurate health and sleep data.

Title: Gives lots of useful relevant…
Content: Gives lots of useful relevant information; encourages attention to health and stress management. Keeping the ring connected to the app is a bit inconsistent, though.

Title: AWESOME RING
Content: MY RING IS VERY HELPFUL IN KEEPING UP WITH MY HEALTH

Title: Small product, big impact
Content: I tend to be sedentary. Ringconn gently reminds me to move more, allows me to set step goals and tells me how I'm doing each day. It tracks my sleep as well as my stress levels. It probably does a lot more but these are the features I like. Oh, it's comfortable and tells me when to recharge too.

Title: Easy to buy
Content: Easy to buy. Great that they sent size examples. It is great to just have a ring for steps and so much more and I can still wear my favourite watch. Super happy

Title: Your support after the initial…
Content: Your support after the initial confusion with the sizing

Title: Setup and early use was fantastic
Content: Setup and early use was fantasticly easy and quite rewarding to have that data so well presented almost instantly. The battery life and charging system is incredible. Well done. The Ringcon is definitely at the age technology where it should be, if not leading technology. Would be nice to have a feature to automatically detect exercise type, also something maybe detects Glucose levels, and/ or keto levels.

Title: This is the fitness ring to get
Content:
After exhaustively researching the”Big 4” names in fitness rings (Oura, Circular, Ultrahuman and RingConn), I chose RingConn. RingConn was less expensive, had a lot of excellent (and believable) reviews and, perhaps most importantly, has NO MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION/EXTORTION FEE (which other companies should be absolutely ashamed to charge for such an expensive product). The RingConn ring isn’t quite as nice-looking as some of the others, but it looks absolutely fine, so I have no regrets on that front.

I’ve been wearing the ring for 2+ months. It took a few days for the ring to “get to know” me and provide what appeared to be accurate data, but it has been rock-steady and excellent ever since. The results are consistent with (and I think more accurate than) my Galaxy Watch’s sleep data. (The only thing which confuses both my RingConn and my Galaxy watch is my bed’s vibrating massage function; using it typically results in inaccurate sleep data.). The RingConn app provides detailed information, but is very user-friendly and easy to understand. The few times I found errors in the data (which turned out to be caused by the bed’s massage function), I submitted a ticket through the app and received a satisfactory response within a day. The charging box is the best charging system of any ring; it is super-convenient and works flawlessly. I typically charge the ring every few days while I take a shower just because that’s convenient, but based on the battery level readings in the app, one charge would last 6-7 days.

I’m glad I did so much research before choosing RingConn. This brand seem to be the underdog of fitness rings at the moment, but I would not be surprised if they end up the leader. IMHO, RingConn’s product design, accuracy, price, customer service and pay-once model leave the others in the dust.

Title: The ring is almost perfect
Content: The ring is almost perfect, but the sole function are missing like payment using the ring, and is not a real problem but the led (used for the sensors) are really visible it will be better if we never see the light

Title: I was excited about this ring but it…
Content: I was excited about this ring but it was a let down. It broke about 1.5 months into usage and now will not successfully charge. Complete waste of my money- do not buy!

Title: Light weight & stylish
Content: Love that the app is free! The battery lasts 7-8 days. I can wear my watches instead of tracking on my samsung watch all the time. Light weight, stylish and comfortable.

Title: Long battery life
Content:
Long battery life, accurate and very helpfull sensors. I knew from my higher sleep skin temperature that I was getting sick and indeed 24 hours later I had the flue... Next time when I have similar situation, I know I should immediately start taking zinc and higher dose vitamine D

Now I also see exactly which terrible effect alcohol and stress has my body. Highly recommend!

Title: I was an original backer on Indiegogo…
Content: I was an original backer on Indiegogo and after less than a year of use and my battery lasts less than 20 hours, no where close to the 7 days promised. I’ve emailed support and have gotten a complete runaround. This ring is completely useless now apparently Ringconn does not stand by their products. Don’t waste your money!

Title: The company is maddeningly difficult to deal with.
Content:
The company is maddeningly difficult to deal with.
Purchased the ring and found the thing I purchased it for (SpO2) records well at night, but during the day with movement, the data does NOT record and a great deal of information is absent.
Heart rate seems to record better.
All the other "fitness" crap is of little use to me.
I have been emailing back and forth for a week trying to return the ring. Company representatives have put on EVERY stall tactic they can possibly think of to put me off. They have NOT responded to my last email.

Title: Not an accurate device
Content: The device continually provided inaccurate steps and sleeping information -- the numbers were greater than actual experience. Emailed for support and they returned email but not a return for the ring. Their 14-day return policy passed by as the customer support tried to prolong the solution process. Finally had credit card company dispute the charge.

Title: After one workout, very scratched
Content: After one workout, the black ring was scratched really bad. They include these ridiculous silicone bands to put on the ring which look horrible. If you buy a health tracking device, you expect it will stand up to working out.

Title: It seems to make the data up
Content:
Initially all seemed well. Long wait to receive the ring during the Kickstarter campaign, but the company tried to keep people updated, even though their own spreadsheet didn't match up with delivery volumes and dates.
After wearing the ring for a few months, I've been receiving worrying heart rate data of very high heart rate. These figures didn't match up at all with a smart watch readings, or an external blood pressure monitor.
Heart rate around 60bpm, ring sometimes records resting heart rate 170-220bpm. During these high heart rate recording other devices track a higher heart rate of 80-100bpm, but no where near the figures RingConn records. And these are not brief blips of a minute or two, but 30-60 minute periods.
I have contacted RingConn on a few occasions, sending them data showing the high reading and just receive a standard copy and paste reply, basically fobbing me off, saying they are aware of high heart rate readings and updating software/algorithms to correct the issue, which never seems to happen.
As for the rest of the data the ring provides, the sleep figures can be way off as well, which is the only other metric I can verify. And as I've got no way of checking the rest of the data, I've got no way of confirming how accurate it is.
RingConn keep updating the design of the app, which is pointless if the data it shows isn't accurate.
Basically, don't buy a RingConn ring, it'll be money wasted.

Title: This is a total fraud company
Content: This is a total fraud company. Chinese company with a one person call center in California. No matter what you state in your emails to them, you get the same formatted response letter stating that they are sorry and working with the shipping department etc. Use your credit card fraud/return protection policy .

Title: Quick delivery, easy to set up, and accurate Bio ring
Content: I researched this ring and others before settling on the Ringconn, primarily because there is no recurring cost. I found the analytics to be similar with more costly rings. I ordered the ring sizing kit on Nov.20. The kit was delivered on Nov. 27. I submitted my ring size on Nov. 28, and received my ring on Dec. 11. The ring is simple to set up and I compared the Ringconn analytics with some of my other heath monitoring systems and the Ringconn is accurate, and looks good as well.

Title: I went from a fitbit to Oura and now to…
Content: I went from a fitbit to Oura and now to Ring Conn, very very happy!! It has the step accuracy of fitbit, Oura is not even close to being an accurate step counter. This ring automatically recognizes exercise and then rates the level of exercise accurately! Plus, you can't just add a workout and cheat this setup, it knows when your working out. With fitbit or Oura you can manually add the workout which then inflates your heart rate and gives you workout credit whether you actually worked out or not?? Oura is slow to recognize stress, this ring is spot on all the time! This is the only ring that gives you 24hr automatic heart rate, spo2 and hrv readings all the time that is super accurate and then gives you an ongoing average all day and night of those metrics! Come on everyone, please realize your HRV is the epicenter of all of your workout or just normal recovery from anything your doing! This ring nails it even when compared to my chest strap that measures my HRV and I can see it at a glance anytime, wherever I am! The information pages are like no other app with ongoing averages to all your other metrics and a trend format like no other. I am surprised there is no monthly charge for this app. I bought the silver and it is a beautiful ring, matte finish in the center to a polished surface on the edges, very durable too. If I listened to all the marketing bs comparing this ring to the others, I might not have bought this ring, just buy it and enjoy, it is truly the best!!

Title: The ring is NOT titanium
Content:
The ring is NOT titanium. The website and customer service are telling me the surface of the ring is titanium but it's very clearly plastic. I can scratch it with my fingernail. I messaged customer service and they keep emailing me it's titanium. I am insulted by the blatant lie. Very shady that they are lying about that. Can't trust a company that lies.

Otherwise it's been good.

Title: One star rating is too high!
Content:
One star rating is too high for this ring! Especially in the service area. My ring stopped connecting to my phone. After going through my own solutions, I reached out to them. Crickets!!!!! Is it because the ring is still covered by warranty?
Buyer beware!!!!!!
Suspect quality (longevity), deceptive warranty. No service.

Title: RingConn will not exchange for a bigger…
Content: RingConn will not exchange for a bigger size. I’ve never heard of a company not willing to work with the consumer. Very poor customer service.

Title: I ordered from Australia
Content: I ordered from Australia. Waited 2 weeks and contacted Ring Conn who have no idea of my order although money is taken. Contacting bank to refund under insurance.

Title: Very Dissatisfied Customer
Content: I ordered a ring from RingConn after researching many different ones. I did not pick the "I don't know my size" as I have a ring sizer at home and I know my ring size. However, once I received my ring and wore it for 3 days my 2nd knuckle on my pointer finger was sore and bruised; however the ring itself fit. I have long skinny fingers so the width of the ring takes up the entire area from the end of my finger where it touches my hand to the 2nd knuckle (I ordered the ring to fit both index fingers along with both pointer fingers). I have 2 autoimmune disorders that affect my joints and cause pain so sometimes I am unsure how something with affect my skin, joints, and be comfortable for me until I get and wear it. This happened once I wore the ring. I emailed the RingConn less than a week of receiving and wearing the ring explaining the situation and was told my circumstance does not allow for returns and I could either continue to wear it (even though I told them it is painful and causing bruises) or I could gift it to someone. So, I am now going to be out the money the ring cost along with having to purchase another tracker of some kind. I received absolutely no assistance from the company whatsoever. I do understand that I chose the the ring size and like I said it does fit but there are things that I cannot always plan for with having autoimmune disorders which is partly the reason why I chose their product as it would track some health measures I needed and wanted.

Title: Absolutely Beautiful RingConn, ordered wrong size exchanging now.
Content: I had ordered a RingConn and accidentally picked the wrong size. I submitted a ticket to exchange for a different size and they were very helpful. I am so excited to get the right size. The RingConn is very well made and beautiful. The charging case makes all the difference in the world for a traveler.

Title: Scam company no customer service
Content: They have had my money for over a month now and still no ring. They refuse to respond to messages and I am fed up. Do not trust this scam company!!!!!

Title: They don’t like returns
Content: If you try to return the ring because the metrics aren’t accurate they ignore your request and drag out the return process. Had to fight with my credit card company to dispute it. Update: Eventually got refund, but it left a bad taste in my mouth. Just give people refunds instead of fighting it. You’re only tanking your company image.

Title: Very Satisfied User
Content:
I have been using my RingConn for about a month now and it has been very helpful in monitoring my health. I purchased it specifically for the sleep tracking since I can’t stand to wear my bulky Apple Watch to sleep. The sleep tracking data is very thorough and complete and gives a score every night on the quality of your sleep which I find helpful at a glance to see how it went. As far as the fitness tracking and heart rate I wear both ring and watch during the day and both get the same (or very similar) results so I believe that the fitness data the ring collects is pretty accurate. I have a friend with the Oura ring and have compared data with them and the RingConn records the same data without the need for a paid subscription which is a great feature. Also I think that the RingConn’s detailed sleep data is more inclusive than what the Oura is able to provide. Overall I’m very happy with my ring and I find it so easy to wear I forget it’s there!

Just an FYI the shipping takes a very long time to arrive but that’s ok I was able to communicate with support and was reassured that it was on the way and not lost.

Title: No customer service support
Content: I have decided to delete this post, since communications have been re-established on a daily basis, options offered and the issue is in process of being resolved. I think were making good progress.

Title: Brilliant health monitoring device
Content:
Have loved this ring from moment I started wearing it.
Love all the features, it's comfortable and gives me so much information.
Longest part of the process was receiving the sizing kit, but actusl ring arrived within a few days.
Started using it straight away. I have a Samsung phone and it has paired nicely. I have a Samsung smart watch and a Tag one and have to say the ring is hands down better!
There are no monthly fees like some others, which made me favour this particular one after a lot of research, and I'm glad I did. The app that links the ring to your phone is probably one of the best apps around, the battery is superb and my ring lasts almost a full week before I have to recharge it... then it fully recharges within about 1 hour in the lovely wee case it came in.
My daily summary gives me not only sleep and stress info by each hour but also gives me my activity and steps. It compares day to day for activity, stress, sleep, heart rate, and activity calories plus more.
I am a real tech gadget person and this genuinely is one of the best products around for monitoring your health.
I love this ring so much my wife will be getting one for Christmas 😀

Title: Proud user of the RingConn
Content:
I always wanted smart ring after I saw first products like Oura, but decided to wait some time until I find one which would meet all the criteria. RingConn did it! I already use it few days and I am impressed! But, I am not only impressed with the ring itself, but also with the community and the customer service. They reply within few hours and I appreciate the way how they do so. Last but not least I am also impressed with speediness of the updates and their activity on FB group.

Keep doing, I am proud owner of the product.

Title: A challenger for Oura
Content: This ring is absolutely stunning 😍 I used to have an Oura but switched to a Ringconn. I don't regret this decision at all. - Monthly fee - Portable charging case - Heart rate and SpO2 24/7 (Oura, only at night time) - Stress level measuring - Sleep data is accurate. I didn't have Oura same time but i had AppleWatch7. Ringconn is much more accurate with sleep data and steps. Ringconn really listen clients. They are active in FB group. Whicht features we would like to have etc. ❤️ 10 / 10 🎯

Title: The BEST health tracking ring
Content:
This company shows searious business with not only producing a high quality health tracking ring WITHOUT subscription and they have the best, friendliest and fastest responding costumer service.
Not only is the CS fantastic, but the whole company is involved in the development and feedback from their costumers in the most positive way.

The ring have a exclusive, great design and doesn't only look good, if feels comfortable to wear.
And it's the only ring on the market that comes with a charging case that holds 18 charges to the ring. And the ring have a battery that lasts for 7 days. How about that ?

After ordering the ring you'll be sent a sizing kit so you can determin your size and color of choise and when RingConn gets your order the ring will be sent to you in a premium presentation box.

The app is very pedagogical built and holds a ton of information recived from the ring. It's very easy to read the info from a summary on the first page of the app before diving in to the details.

I recommend anyone to do business with this company and their Health Tracking Ring is an amazing product with a constant development.

Title: Health tracking ring
Content:
The thing I love most about my RingConn ring is that it doesn't look like a tech device, it simply looks good.
On top of that it's very light and I don't feel that it's on my finger. The brushed gold looks beautiful.

Great that there is no monthly fee to get access to your data.

The ring is water resistant and I don't have to worry washing hands, doing dishes, showering, swimming or jumping in sea.

The RingConn app is very intuitive to use. And the company is constantly working on new features to implement. They have made some changes to the app so it's more functional.

I love the activity/daily calories & step count. It helps to see how active you need to be to maintain or lose weight.
The sleep tracking is very accurate and so is the heartrate and stress score tracking. (Compared to other wearables and medical equipement)
Bonus is the sleep temp.

The company is constantly updating the app and the RingConn firmware.
Making positive changes to help improve the product so it gets to be even better. They actually listen to their users. There have been several positive changes since I started using my ring about 4 months ago.

Great device for health tracking.

Title: Heartrate monitoring Work perfect
Content:
I do my morning run with the Ring and Garmin 965, the heart rate reading was identical , it surprise me a lot , wont expect this tiny ring can do....

RingConn ---- Well Done!!!

Title: Ringconn rings are great
Content:
I made a purchase in January of my very own ringconn ring. The app has been a great work in progress. We find a bug, they fix it. This is the first time a beta group has been so active. Now that the bugs have been worked out they just keep.maling improvements in the software. This wing has been great.

The astetics of the ring
The ring simply looks great. There is comfort and quality to put into the ring and makes me feel like they care about the product. They keep releasing the accessories and seem to put a lot of thought into them as well. I am so pleased with this product.

Cost.
At 279.00 it's a great deal. The other companies in the ring market are about the same price but don't offer the same matrix. They also (some) charge a monthly fee. The ringconn company has said a number of times they will not have a monthly fee, and they haven't.

I love my ring and am so happy I invested in it

Title: Simply the best smart health device…
Content: Simply the best smart health device that passively collects accurate results. I replaced my Apple Watch with the RingConn. I highly recommend it! It will take over Oura ring with confidence!

Title: Have had the ring for a few months now…
Content: Have had the ring for a few months now and I love how detailed the app is. Tracking my sleep at night was one of the primary reasons I bought this in addition to no monthly fee like Oura has to use the product. I have noticed the ring often does not pick up naps automatically, but other then that I have no real complaints or issues. The support to date has been excellent from the Ringconn team- always friendly and helpful. This is a great product that should continue to get better with time and future software / firmware updates. Was somewhat skeptical buying this initially since there was no history to go on, but its proven to be a valuable everyday smart ring that I enjoy wearing daily.

Title: Having ringconn is a plus
Content: I didn't got my ring yet but I like all the features that come in. I have my apple watch that works as a health tracker that measure heart rate, oxygen saturation and sleep stages but I need a different health tracker such as ringconn that can give me more details with scoring system on all vitals that will help to improve my health with exercise, sleeping and more. I would like to see in the future update the temperature sensor working as well. I also would like to see electrodermal sensor that can help in measuring the anxiety level in addition to the heart rate variability. It will also be beneficial to have fall detection, detection of heart attack or Afib, haptic alarm and may be blood pressure sensor. Thank you to ringconn team

Title: Do not buy, scam, no support
Content:
They don’t use US size rings. But they don’t say so anywhere except on the return page.

Customer support has not responded to any of my subsequent emails. Only advice was try another finger (as if I hadn’t tried that).

Do not buy.

Title: I got conned by RingConn
Content: I got conned by RingConn. The Heart Rate data is inaccurate, it never measures high intensity exercise. I've called, emailed, and submitted feedback through their app, the customer support team is giving me the full run-around, refusing to take accountability for their faulty product, and refusing to take my product back for a refund / return. Do not buy!

Title: Phantastic
Content:
Well, I am an early supporter of the idea, loving that subscription free solution.

I am usually wearing mechanical watches only, thus the ring supposed to be my device.

Update: the ring came right before the holiday season and is now in constant use, on the beach (salty atlantico), sweet water pool and on all other occasions.

I have been a bit skeptical lately after seeing the offer of a silicon protection cover; that maybe sand could damage the surface, scratching and so on.

Well, I have ordered the protecting ring but so far I don't have any complaints, even though the ring faces tough conditions, heat, sun, salt water etc..

I am very happy about the data the ring provides, data enabling me to have objective insights into (body/health) facts instead of feelings.

Beside the insights (and data means power in regard to our core asset, life), the ring looks stunning and can be worn without having a smartphone nearby as data will be synced later on.

Well, that's one of the best purchases I have ever made and it's going to boost knowledge about my body and supports me on my way to take even better care of myself, for me and my loved once.

Thumbs up.

Title: Two time loser
Content: This is my second go-round with RingConn. I was in the original backer group, waited months and months, then finally got my ring. I was delighted because the app was so good, but it stopped pairing after two days and wouldn't power up at all. I sent it back. Months later, the replacement arrived and the same thing happened. Two days of wearing it and it stopped pairing, then refused to power up. These rings come from China, so who knows what's going on. All I know is that I am out a couple hundred bucks for a ring that's more or less bricked.

Title: The ring arrived faulty
Content: The ring arrived faulty, contacted customer services a number of times to try and resolve it. They have stopped responding and have to go through the bank to get a chargeback. Shaddy company, avoid!!!!

Title: Finally a serious contender in the health ring arena
Content:
I just received my order of a gorgeous black RingConn and I have to say how impressed I am with the quality of work that has gone into creating this ring. From its packaging to functionality, fit and esthetics, this health tracking ring beats the front runner in this field, hands down. For example it can measure blood SpO2 saturation index continuously 24/7, something that even the Oura ring can not do without draining the battery and talk about battery, I just LOVE the charging box that comes with it, a subtle (and functional) addition that no other similar smart ring, has. The ring charges from almost no charge, within an hour or so and the charge lasts for a good 6-7 days.
The app is also a work of art and packed with live and historical health data and other information. You can just tell that a massive amount of work has gone into creating RingConn app alone.
RingConn also has built in temperature sensors and will soon activate the feature with an app update to measure core body temperature too. It currently only measures "Skin Temperature"during sleep, and again another feature that Oura doesn't have.
As for accuracy, I have checked the SpO2 and Sleep data against my medical grade Oximeter and my ZEO EKG device. The results are within 2% of each other. In contrast my Oura Ring results are within a 6% margin of error which makes the RingConn an undisputed winner in accuracy, as far as I am concerned.
I would definitely recommend it.

The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The rinSee more

The RingConn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has! I highly suggest this ring since there’s no monthly fee & the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the aSee more

Love the idea of the ring. Somethings to note. It gets scratched very easily and I'm not expecting it to look great a year from now. Also there are no postpartum or pregnancy setting for the fertilitySee more
Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: Great and innovative product
Content: Great and innovative product. Very useful as a health tracker with accurate data from various vital body sensors. The project is still evolving and the engineering team is carefully listening and responding to customers expectations. Finally - it looks classy :)

Title: Won’t stay connected
Content: Worn for only two days and ring constantly loses connection to the app. Without connection the device is worthless. Pretty disappointing.

Title: Worked well
Content: RingConn smart ring provides comprehensive and detailed health tracking without any subscription fees. I have been using it for over 5 months, and each update has enhanced the overall experience. The sleep tracking feature is particularly impressive, as it provides insights into my sleep score factors, allowing me to make improvements to my sleep patterns. The heart rate and step count measurements are also accurate. I would gladly recommend this smart ring to my friends. Great job!

Title: I was in the original purchase group of…
Content:
I was in the original purchase group of RingConn. My first experiences with the ring were fantastic, much better than Oura. The HRV was all day and not just during sleep and it was accurate. The step counter was also accurate. The heart rate was not only accurate but continuous.

Then the ring simply stopped working. One night I woke up and there was no sleep data and no HRV data. This happened multiple times. I wrote to the company and received back a message obviously written by somebody who didn't speak English very well. Because I've had the ring for a few months, I cannot get my money back. So I put the Oura ring back on my finger and chalked this up to the normal fraud mongers who are out there looking to take our money.

Caveat emptor: Be careful of this company. Once a tracking device misses one day there is never a reason to wear it again. This ring has possibilities but isn't ready for prime time. Expect it to stop working and then expect customer service to write you back and talk to you like English is their sixth language.

Title: Great Smart Ring and Health Tracker
Content:
I backed this company on Indiegogo and I have to say that both the hardware and app is very impressive.

The ring is of a high quality and the app is user friendly. Communication has been top notch from RingConn through the whole process and still is, via email, the in-app feedback form and in the Facebook group, where they are very involved in conversations and listen to suggestions.

I have only had my ring for 3 days so far and still going on the first charge, but data seems accurate and the user experience really great.

Title: A great ring - no subscription - great price
Content:
I’ve had the ring for couple months now and really love it, so easy to use and the app is brilliantly easy to use
The main things I love is Heart-rate, oxygen levels, HRV, and sleep data,and walking I find all these neat correct to my other devices I use to check my health
I had the Oura ring but, not happy with it plus the subscription put me off even more
Since having the ring I’ve found the service from RingConn to be brilliant, they answer you in feedback in the app by email, and mr Dylan answers questions on the group, ive read here that group is toxic, I’ve only found it to be really helpful, someone in it will always try and help, with questions,
The app is really developing and now night time temperature working thats brilliant
Overall I love this ring I don’t need my watch at night, it lasts 6-7 days on one charge, it has a charging case with 18 charges in it so no wires required
Keep up the great work RingConn you should be proud to produce a brilliant ring that I love

Title: RingConn is much better than Oura
Content:
I have been wearing RingConn for a week now. I really like this!

I had Oura before. I have to admit that Oura is good for sleep tracking but 7$ in a month for subscription fee is too much. As a matter of principle i unsubscribed and i also sold my Oura.

I can compare RingConn sleep tracking to my Apple watch. I have to say that i believe RingConn more than Apple watch.

RingConn steps calcularor is working too. You can see walking distance. Oura’s steps wasnt working. I also like RingConn’s stress monitoring and also all the other features too. I dont miss Oura at all.

Some users complaining about scratches. Well… my Oura got so scratched that they changed my ring (warranty). Of course these can get scratches in hard use like phones watches etc. You can use wrap paper or something if you like to cover your ring.

Somebody said that Facebook admin and community are toxic. Well.. my experience is the opposite. Community helps each other and admins are there too. They also help people with their problems. I sent email to RingConn and they replied at the same day.

Overall:
I really recommend RingConn. Better looking than Oura. These guys updating app/ring and i have a feeling that they take this project seriously. Even more features than Oura (example stress monitoring). No monthly subscription fee and also RingConn is cheaper than Oura.

Title: Not accurate. Toxic Community. Censorship!
Content:
I compared the ring with multiple other trackers like Oura, Polar, Xiaomi, Whoop and a medical grade SpO2 sensor.
Sleep, SpO2 and HRV are completely off.
When trying to post friendly about my problems on the Facebook group, they got deleted.
The community and admin is toxic, like other users posted here. Support is not helping. Any negative comment gets you ridiculed and when you response you get kicked out. Censorship is very high and maintained trough several user profiles.
DO NOT BUY!

Title: Hard working company with a exellent product !
Content:
This is a fairly young company with a lot of ambition, knowleage and will to produce high quality Health Tracking Rings.
I've communicated with them numerous times through their costumer service and have always got a fast, polite answer to my questions within a day.
I was a Indiegogo backer to their Health Tracking Ring and my sizing kit arrived quickly.
When I recieved my ring, I was firstly amazed over the premium presentation box it was delivered in and the ring itself is built with care, precision and the look of the ring is exclusive, to say the least.
The app is very pedagogical built and holds a ton of information recived from the ring. It's very easy to read the info from a summary on the first page of the app before diving in to the details.
I highly recommend anyone to do business with this company and their Health Tracker Ring is an amazing product.

Title: This company is in China, they are using a fake address.
Content: This company lied to its users by stating false location and delivery times. This is not an American company as advertised. They are in China. As such a company your data belongs to the PRC. They have curated reviews and responses in social media to further deceive buyers. Far too much deception from a new company.

Title: Broken promises
Content: Broken promises, deceptive responses, still no products for most backers, delivery date was Feb 2023, at current production rate delivery will be Xmas, and the product isn't even working as described, still no temp readings.

Title: Very Pleased!
Content:
I was one of the first 20 backers of this IndieGoGo kickstarter campaign and have no regrets whatsoever. Received my sizing kit and ultimately my ring in the timeframe promised by RingConn. This company is EXTREMELY proactive and the communication with their backers has been EXTRAORDINARY.

The app software and ring firmware are works in progress, however, I’m not a fussy person as I see RingConn putting a lot of time and effort into development.

Sadly, the negative reviews on here are ridiculous at best with RingConn not deserving the negativity as they’ve been ALWAYS upfront and transparent with their backer unlike any other kickstarter campaign I know of.

My experience has been positive and some of the data has been extremely accurate but also know with this first generation ring that it will get better over time. What people need to know is smartwatches and smart rings are NOT medical devices but are excellent for baseline numbers only.

Title: Really an amazing wearable health device
Content: From the moment I got this amazing ring I have loved it. Right now I struggle with stress and sleep, so I decided on this ring. I have an Apple watch but it does not give me as much information as this ring. There are no monthly fees like some those other rings have. The app that links the ring to your phone is probably one of the best apps around. My ring lasts almost a full week before I have to recharge it. And it only takes about an hour to get it fully recharged. I received my ring in February so I have been wearing it every day since. Honestly, I don't even wear my Apple watch anymore since I got this ring. It gives me so much info on the times in the day my stress level rises so I can try to control those times better. I really like all of the information it gives me about what my heart and breath rhythms are doing throughout the night. My daily summary gives me not only my sleep and stress info by each hour in also gives me my activity and steps. It compares my day to day for activity, stress, sleep, heart rate, and activity calories plus more. This is really one of the best products around for monitoring your health. I love this ring so much I bought one for my husband.

Title: Don't go near them until the product is in retail!
Content: A Startup doing an Indiegogo with bad communication, fostering a toxic community. If you critique the company or question their communication, you get harassed by company spokes persons. To top if off, management finds it funny.

Title: The best customer service I ever saw!
Content: Im one of the first bakers who ordered the ring. As promised I got my ring in February. The ring do everything it should be: activity (steps, heart rate, HRV etc.), stress levels, sleep monitoring (with respiratory rate and SpO2 or naps during the day). You can also measure SpO2 or heart rate manually. The App is simple and has a nice overview. For 2 months there were 3 updates including Apple Health/ Google Fit integration. And soon temperature measurement is coming. RingConn provides service never seen from another company: they answer all the customers questions, send info emails, make even personal interviews so they can improve every day. You get much more for what you paid! I can only recommend!

Title: Data is the new gold in tech- beware of…
Content: Data is the new gold in tech- beware of where your data is going and to whom it will $old!

Title: Best smart ring on the market!!
Content:
This ring works, unlike some others out there. RingConn came to crowdfunding ready to deliver and they have. I had another ring briefly and despite being a market leader, I had horrible customer service from them and had to send that ring back.
This ring is absolutely amazing. Yes it's a startup company, yes this is the first generation ring, but this is by far the most responsive company I have ever seen.
They're just they're not just shipping any old thing like some are, they are shipping live working rings, and they are working every day to make them better.
We've had software updates, we've had firmware updates, they have multiple channels for people who've received their rings already to submit issues and they're working on them and fixing them and they're putting serious effort into making this the best smart ring out there. If I had gotten a tenth of this support from that other company, I might still have that ring.
I thought smart rings were a great idea from when I first heard of them, I can't wear the watches comfortably because my wrists are too small, and I'm absolutely thrilled with this product. It is lightweight, and fits well And it does a great job of what it's supposed to. Someone else has posted on here all the things it does, so I'm not going to list them again, and I'll admit all of the readings are not 100% perfect yet, but since I've had mine, I've seen it get better and better and better. I keep thinking I want to get one from another company just to be able to compare them, but so far, there's no one out there that even comes close to being worth bothering with.
If you're thinking of getting a smart ring, this is the one. This ring is actually in production, and being shipped. It is not a pie in the sky fantasy like some of the other ones being sold are and there's no monthly subscription fee, so they're not trying to do a money grab. These rings are being shipped, and they are working.

Title: The company says they are in Delaware…
Content:
The company says they are in Delaware United states they are not.

I ordered in December of 2022, at the time. They said they are in production mode with local delivery in February.

In January the sizing kit arrived, and that apparently fulfilled the pledge. Ring has not yet shipped, and they have said, we meant to say shipping starts after Feb.

Of the 7100 backers from Dec around 900 have received rings.

The rest get to run around the company is actually out of china. They are currently under investigation from Indegogo for violation of crowdfunding rules.

They are extremely aggressive at removing all negative reviews on social media. Anyone says anything negative or complains about the ring. Gets the post deleted as hate speech.

They have now said they will ship another 1500 sometime in the next few weeks (maybe)

They say so many contradicting things its incredible.

So far most people getting black rings.. are showing they are easily scratched.

Sleep data is way off, and seams to be generic. A few users posted screen shots. Showing they had the exact same sleep data.

Issues reported with steps.

They advertise they do body temp, but now say its not actually enabled at this time. And will be at a later date.

But is still listed as a feature.

I would avoid this Chinese company that is pretending to be a US company at all costs.

Title: RingConn Smart Ring
Content:
Spotted this ring on indigogo site in Nov 2022 was a bit wary of buying as some company’s do not always deliver
But from purchasing the product they stated deliveries estimated Feb/March 2023 if I remember rightly
They gave lots of updates and within a month I received my sizing ring December 2022 and the Ring in February 6 2023
Wow what a piece of technology well worth the money it does exactly same as the Oura ring but no subscription.
They say 7 day battery life had it on for 7 days and still 19% battery and took 1 hour to recharge to 100% so really impressed , also it has portable charging case good for vacations. I
The company have been very good on answering any questions on messenger
All readings on the app are quite good couple small glitches but there ironing them out,
I have compared it to my Apple Watch and very similar only this does a great deal more
On the ring the sizing kit I picked size 12 and when the ring come size 12 it was actually comfier than the sizing ring.
If anyone thinking of getting a smart ring I highly recommend this one absolutely love it even picks up when I have a nap
These are the charts in the app
Couple small bugs with app but to be expected it’s really improved since last update and another one due very soon also noticed they do have offices in Delaware as found on internet search

Temperature tracking due soon

Sp02

Temperature coming soon it’s built in just perfecting logarithm they say.
Overall 5 stars great company to deal with
Update :- since last update sleep data improved, the app has improved, the company very responsive to answering questions and even put live link to talk to people about the ring on Facebook page very responsive to questions
Made enquiries and yes there is a office in Delaware for tax purposes and in use there’s lots offices in that area for this issue
Apple health is now integrated into the app end of April for Temperature addition
Sleep manual alteration added to app so you can set time to bed and up again
Aeroplane mode added in app
And many more features coming soon
Overall this ring and the app are improving with every updates
